src: Sagnfræðingar hafa áður gagnrýnt verklagsreglur FBI fyrir að leggja höfuðáherslu á auðleyst mál, sér í lagi eltingaleiki við stolna bíla, í því skyni að bæta árangurshlutfall stofnunarinnar. Þingið hóf að fjármagna framtaksverkefni gegn klámi fjárhagsárið 2005 og tók fram að alríkislögreglan yrði að verja 10 fulltrúum í klámbransann.
mt: Historians have previously criticized FBI procedures for focusing on solved cases, especially car thefts, in order to improve the agency's clearance rate. The program began funding anti-theft initiatives in fiscal year 2005 and required local police departments to assign 10 officers to the task force.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: JAS 39C Gripen-flugvélin brotlenti á flugbraut um klukkan 9:30 að staðartíma (02:30 UTC). Hún sprakk og lokað var á allt áætlunarflug á flugvellinum. Staðfest var að flugmaðurinn var leiðtogi flokksins, Dilokrit Pattavee. Samkvæmt fjölmiðlum á staðnum valt slökkvibíl á flugvellinum eftir að hafa farið í útkallið.
mt: 39C Gripen jet crashed on the runway at around 9:30 local time (02:30 UTC). It exploded and all scheduled flights at the airport were cancelled. It was confirmed that the pilot was the leader of the group, Dilokrit Pattavee. According to local media, a fire truck went into the crash site after it had gone out of control.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Á sjöunda áratugnum vann Brzezinski fyrir John F. Kennedy sem ráðgjafi hans og síðan fyrir ráðuneyti Lyndon B. Johnson. Í valinu árið 1976 var hann ráðgjafi Carter í utanríkismálum, þjónaði því næst sem þjóðaröryggisráðgjafi frá 1977 til 1981, tók við af Henry Kissinger. Sem ráðgjafi í þjóðaröryggismálum var hann Carter innan handar í utanríkismálum, t.d. á fundinum í Camp David árið 1978; við að koma á eðlilegum samskiptum milli Bandaríkjanna og Kína á áttunda áratugnum; í írönsku byltingunni, sem leiddi til gíslatökunnar í Íran árið 1979; og í innrás Sovétríkjanna í Afganistan árið 1979.
mt: 1970s, Brzezinski served as a foreign policy adviser to John F. Kennedy and then to Lyndon B. Johnson. In the 1976 election, he was a foreign policy adviser to Carter, and then served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As National Security Advisor, he was Carter's closest foreign policy confidant, for example at the Camp David Accords in 1978; in the normalization of relations between the United States and China in the late 1970s; in the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis in 1979; and in the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Bobek fæddist í Zagreb, höfuðborg Króatíu, og öðlaðist frægð fyrir að spila fyrir Partizan Belgrade. Hann gekk til liðs við þá árið 1945 og var með þeim til 1958. Þann tíma sem hann spilaði með liðinu skoraði hann 403 mörk í 468 leikjum. Enginn annar hefur leikið fleiri leiki eða skorað fleiri mörk fyrir félagið en Bobek. Árið 1995 var hann valinn besti leikmaður í sögu Partizan.
mt: Bobek was born in Zagreb, the capital of Croatia, and gained fame for playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and played with them until 1958. At the time he played for the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 games. No other player has played more games or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995, he was named the best player in the history of Partizan.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

mt: Bobek was born in Zagreb, the capital of Croatia, and gained fame for playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and played with them until 1958. At the time he played for the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 games. No other player has played more games or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995, he was named the best player in the history of Partizan.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "Hesperonychus elizabethae er tegund í fjölskyldu Dromaeosauridae og er náskyld snareðlu. Kenningar voru uppi um að þessi fullfjaðraði ránfugl með heitt blóð hafi gengið uppréttur á tveim fótum og verið með klær eins og snareðla. Önnur kló hennar var stærri og því var hún nefnd Hesperonychus sem þýðir ""vesturklóin."""
mt: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a member of the Dromaeosauridae family and is closely related to Velociraptor. Speculations were made that this warm-blooded running dinosaur with a feathered coat stood on two legs and had claws like Velociraptor. Its other claw was larger and thus it was named Hesperonychus which means "western claw"."
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Að minnsta kosti 100 manns voru í partíinu þar sem fagnað var fyrsta brúðkaupsafmæli hjóna sem héldu brúðkaupið sitt í fyrra. Formlegur viðburður í tilefni afmælisins verður haldinn síðar, að sögn embættismanna. Parið gifti sig í Texas fyrir einu ári og ferðaðist til Buffalo til að halda upp á tilefnið með vinum og vandamönnum. Hinn þrítugi eiginmaður, sem fæddist í Buffalo, var einn af fjórum sem létust í skotárásinni en eiginkona hans varð ekki fyrir meiðslum.
mt: 100 people were in the party celebrating the first anniversary of the couple who had their first wedding in Texas. A formal event to celebrate the anniversary will be held later, according to officials. The couple married in Texas a year ago and traveled to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The groom, who was born in Buffalo, was one of four who died in the shooting but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Luno var með 120–160 rúmmetra af eldsneyti um borð þegar það brotnaði saman og mikill vindur og öldur þrýstu því í hafnargarðinn. Þyrlu fóru í björgunarleiðangur vegna skipverjanna 12 og einu ávarkar þeirra voru eitt nefbrot. Hið 100 metra skip var á leið að sækja hefðbundinn áburðarfarm og til að byrja var ótti hjá embættismönnum að skipið gæti lekið.
mt: 120–160 cubic meters of fuel were on board when the ship broke apart and strong winds and waves pushed it into the harbor. A rescue operation was launched for the crew of 12 and one of them was found dead. The 100-meter ship was on its way to collect a traditional cargo and at first there was concern among officials that the ship could have sunk.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Meðal afreka Vautier önnur en leikstjórn er hungurverkfall 1973 gegn því sem hann taldi vera pólitíska ritskoðun. Frönskum lögum var breytt. Andóf hans nær aftur til 15 ára aldurs þegar hann gekk í raðir frönsku andspyrnuhreyfingarinnar í seinni heimsstyrjöldinni. Hann skrifaði bók um sjálfan sig árið 1998. Á sjöunda áratugnum snéri hann aftur til Alsír, stuttu eftir að landið öðlaðist sjálfstæði, til að kenna kvikmyndaleikstjórn.
mt: 1973, Vautier was expelled from the film industry for his political views. French law was changed. His return to the industry was not until he was 15 years old when he joined the French resistance movement in World War II. He wrote a book about himself in 1998. In the 1970s, he returned to Algeria, shortly after the country gained independence, to teach film direction.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Meira en fjórar milljónir manna héldu til Rómar til að mæta á útförina. Fjöldinn var svo mikill að ekki gátu allir verið viðstaddir jarðarförina á Péturstorginu. Nokkrir stórir sjónvarpsskjáir voru settir upp á ýmsum stöðum í Róm svo fólkið gæti horft á athöfnina. Í mörgum öðrum borgum Ítalíu og annars staðar í heiminum var svipað fyrirkomulag notað, sér í lagi í Póllandi, og mjög mikið af fólki var vitni að viðburðinum.
mt: 4 million people attended the event, so many that not everyone could be on the square. Large TV screens were set up in various places in Rome so people could watch the event. In many other cities in Italy and elsewhere in the world, similar arrangements were made, especially in Poland, and many people witnessed the event.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Fréttir herma að sprenging hafi orðið í íbúð á Macbeth Street vegna gasleka. Fulltrúi gasfyrirtækisins mætti á staðinn eftir að nágranni hringdi og kvartaði yfir gasleka. Íbúðin sprakk eftir að embættismaðurinn var kominn. Ekki var tilkynnt um nein umtalsverð meiðsli en að minnsta kosti fimm manns sem voru á vettvangi þegar sprengingin átti sér stað, voru meðhöndlaðir vegna áfallaeinkenna. Enginn var inni í íbúðinni. Á sama tíma voru nærri 100 íbúar á svæðinu fluttir á brott.
mt: Reports say an explosion occurred in a Macbeth Street apartment due to a gas leak. A gas company representative arrived after a neighbor called and complained about a gas leak. The apartment exploded after the official arrived. No serious injuries were reported, but at least five people who were on the scene were treated for minor injuries. No one was inside the apartment. At the same time, nearly 100 residents of the area were evacuated.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Þeir sem létust voru Nicholas Alden, 25 ára, og Zachary Cuddeback, 21 árs. Cuddeback var bílstjórinn. Edgar Veguilla fékk áverka á handlegg og kjálka en Kristoffer Schneider þurfti að fara í lýtaaðgerð á andliti. Vopn Uka brást þegar því var beint að höfði fimmta mannsins. Schneider er með samfelldan verk, blindur á öðru auga, og hluti af höfuðkúpunni og andlitinu sem vantar er endurgert úr títani. Schneider bar vitni í gegnum myndsendibúnað frá USAF-bækistöð í heimalandinu.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed. Cuddeback was the driver. Edgar Veguilla suffered injuries to his hand and leg and Kristoffer Schneider needed facial reconstruction. The gun of the fourth man misfired when it was pointed at the head of the fifth man. Schneider is blind in one eye, and part of his head, face, and skull are missing. Schneider was testifying via video feed from the USAF base in his home country.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Bæði golf og ruðningur eiga að koma aftur inn á Ólympíuleikana. Alþjóðaólympíunefndin kaus með meðtalningu íþróttagreinanna á framkvæmdastjórnarfundi sínum í Berlín í dag. Rúgbý, einkum rúgbýbandalagið, og golf voru valdar í stað fimm annarra greina til þátttöku á Ólympíuleikunum. Reynt var að koma skvassi, karate og íþróttum á hjólum inn á Ólympíuleikana sem og hafnabolta og mjúkbolta, sem voru kosnir út af Ólympíuleikunum árið 2005. Alþjóðaviðskiptastofnunin þarf samt að staðfesta atkvæðagreiðsluna á fundi sínum sem haldinn verður í október í Kaupmannahöfn.
mt: Golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympics. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby sevens and golf were selected in place of five other sports for the Olympics. Karate, roller sports, wushu and baseball were also considered for the Olympics, as were beach volleyball and softball, which were selected in 2005. The International Federation of Association Football must still approve the vote at its meeting in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: Þann 24. september 1759 ritaði Arthur Guinness undir 9.000 ára leigusamning fyrir St James‘ Gate-brugghúsinu í Dublin á Írlandi. Í dag, 250 árum seinna, er Guinness orðið að alþjóðlegu fyrirtæki og veltir yfir 10 milljörðum evra (14,7 milljörðum USD) árlega.
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. Today, 250 years later, Guinness is an international company and turns over over 10 billion euros (14.7 billion USD) annually.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Staðfest er að stofn af banvænni fuglaflensu, H5N1, hafi smitað villta önd, sem fannst dauð á mánudaginn, í mýrlendi nálægt Lyon í Austur-Frakklandi. Frakkland er sjöunda landið í Evrópusambandinu sem verður fyrir barðinu á þessari veiru. Landið kemur í kjölfarið á Austurríki, Þýskalandi, Slóveníu, Búlgaríu, Grikklandi og Ítalíu. Óstaðfest eru grunuð tilvik um H5N1 í Króatíu og Danmörku.
mt: The H5N1 avian flu virus has infected a wild duck, found dead on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in eastern France. France is the seventh European Union country to be hit by this strain. It follows Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Cases are suspected in Croatia and Denmark.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Friðargæsluliðum Sþ,m sem komu til Haítí eftir jarðskjálftann 2010, er kennt um útbreiðslu sjúkdómsins sem átti upptök sín nærri búðum þeirra. Í málshöfðuninni kemur fram að úrgangur frá stöðvum Sameinuðu þjóðanna hafi ekki verið hreinsaður á fullnægjandi hátt og slíkt hafi valdið því að bakteríur bárust í aðrennslisá Artibonít-áar, einnar af stærstu ám Haítí. Haítí hafði ekki verið í neinum sjúkdómstengdum vandamálum síðan á 1. áratug 19. aldar fyrir komu hermannanna. Stofnun Haítí á sviði réttlætis og lýðræðis benti á óháðar rannsóknir sem sýna að friðargæslusveit Nepals hafði ómeðvitað komið með sjúkdóminn til Haítí. Danielle Lantagne, sérfræðingur Sameinuðu þjóðanna í sjúkdómum, sagði að útbreiðslan hafi líklega verið af völdum friðargæsluliðanna.
mt: 2010 Haiti earthquake peacekeepers are accused of spreading the disease near their base. The case reveals that UN waste was not properly cleaned and that bacteria were brought to the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Haiti had not been in any epidemic since the 1st decade of the 19th century before the arrival of the soldiers. The Haitian Commission on Truth and Justice pointed out independent investigations that show that the Nepalese peacekeepers had unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on diseases, said the spread was likely due to the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: Friðargæsluliðum Sþ,m sem komu til Haítí eftir jarðskjálftann 2010, er kennt um útbreiðslu sjúkdómsins sem átti upptök sín nærri búðum þeirra. Í málshöfðuninni kemur fram að úrgangur frá stöðvum Sameinuðu þjóðanna hafi ekki verið hreinsaður á fullnægjandi hátt og slíkt hafi valdið því að bakteríur bárust í aðrennslisá Artibonít-áar, einnar af stærstu ám Haítí. Haítí hafði ekki verið í neinum sjúkdómstengdum vandamálum síðan á 1. áratug 19. aldar fyrir komu hermannanna. Stofnun Haítí á sviði réttlætis og lýðræðis benti á óháðar rannsóknir sem sýna að friðargæslusveit Nepals hafði ómeðvitað komið með sjúkdóminn til Haítí. Danielle Lantagne, sérfræðingur Sameinuðu þjóðanna í sjúkdómum, sagði að útbreiðslan hafi líklega verið af völdum friðargæsluliðanna.
mt: 2010 Haiti earthquake peacekeepers are accused of spreading the disease near their base. The case reveals that UN waste was not properly cleaned and that bacteria were brought to the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Haiti had not been in any epidemic since the 1st decade of the 19th century before the arrival of the soldiers. The Haitian Commission on Truth and Justice pointed out independent investigations that show that the Nepalese peacekeepers had unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on diseases, said the spread was likely due to the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "Yfirvöld einbeita sér á tafarlausa nauðsyn löggjafans að greiða úr aðstæðunum. ""Núna er mikilvægt, bæði frá sjónarhorni lýðheilsu og réttvísi, að lögin öðlist gildi eins fljótt og auðið er"", sagði talsmaður ríkisstjórnarinnar. Heilbrigðisráðherra tjáði áhyggjur sínar af velferð einstaklinga sem nýttu sér tímabundið lögmæti efnanna er málið lítur að og sökum fíkniefnadóma sem gefnir hafa verið út frá því að breytingar tóku gildi sem eru í andstöðu við stjórnarskrána."
mt: "The authorities are focusing on the urgent need for legislation to clarify the situation. "It is now important, both from the perspective of public health and justice, that the laws have force as soon as possible," said a government spokesman. The health minister expressed his concerns about the welfare of individuals who use the temporary legal status of the substances in question and the issue of drug addiction that have been given out since the changes came into force which are in conflict with the constitution."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "Christopher Garcia, talsmaður lögreglunnar í Los Angeles, sagði að verið væri að rannsaka hinn grunaða karlkyns brotamann fyrir að vera þarna í leyfisleysi frekar en fyrir skemmdarverk. Skiltið varð ekki fyrir raunverulegum skemmdum. Breytingin fór fram með því að nota svarta segldúka með táknum fyrir frið og hjarta til að breyta ""O"" í lágstafa ""e""."
mt: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the investigation was focused on whether the man was there illegally rather than for vandalism. The damage was not significant. The change was made by using a black stencil with peace and heart symbols to change the "O" into a lowercase "e"."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karno er þekktur en umdeildur enskur einkakennari sem kenndi hjá Modern Education and King's Glory. Hann sagðist hafa verið með mest 9000 nemendur. Í minnispunktum sínum notaði hann orðalag sem sumum foreldrum fannst fullgróft og hann blótaði oft í tímum. Modern Education sakaði hann um að hafa prentað stórar auglýsingar í strætisvagna án leyfis og sagt ósatt með því að skýra frá að hann væri aðal enski einkakennarinn. Hann hefur einnig áður verið sakaður um brot á höfundarrétti, en var ekki kærður. Fyrrverandi námsmaður „segist hafa talað slangur í tímum, kennt stefnumótafærni með minnismiðum og hafi gerst vinur nemendanna“.
mt: Carno is a well-known but controversial American private school teacher who taught at Modern Education and King's Glory. He claimed to have taught over 9000 students. In his memories, he used language that some parents found vulgar and he was often criticized in the media. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements in buses without permission and saying false things by claiming that he was the main English private school teacher. He has also been accused of copyright infringement in the past, but was not sued. Former students "are said to have spoken slang in the past, taught a controversial curriculum with their memories, and became friends with students".
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Fyrrverandi lögregluþjónn á Filippseyjum hneppti ferðamenn í Hong Kong í gíslingu með því að ræna langferðabifreið þeirra í Manila, höfuðborg Filippseyja. Rolando Mendoza skaut M16 riffli sínum á ferðamennina. Nokkrum gíslum hefur verið bjargað og staðfest er að að minnsta kosti 6 manns hafa látist. Sex gíslar, m.a. börn og eldri borgarar, voru látnir lausir snemma sem og filippseysku ljósmyndurunum. Ljósmyndararnir tóku síðar stöðu aldraðrar konu þar sem hún þurfti á salernið. Mendoza var skotinn niður.
mt: Former Philippine police officer Rolando Mendoza hijacked a tour bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines, and took tourists hostage. He shot the tourists with his M16 rifle. Some hostages have been rescued and at least six people have been killed. Six hostages, including children and elderly citizens, were released early as well as Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the position of an elderly woman who needed a wheelchair. Mendoza was shot dead.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brasilía er stærsta rómversk-kaþólska landið í heiminum og rómversk-kaþólska kirkjan hefur statt og stöðugt verið mótfallin lögleiðingu hjónabands samkynhneigðra í landinu. Landsþing Brasilíu hefur verið ósammála um lögleiðingu í 10 ár. Sem stendur eru slíkar borgaralegar hjónavígslur aðeins löglegar í Rio Grande do Sul. Upprunalega frumvarpið var sett saman af fyrrum borgarstjóra São Paulo, Mörtu Suplicy. Fyrirhuguð löggjöf, eftir breytingu hennar, er nú á ábyrgðarsviði Roberto Jefferson. Mótmælendur hafa hug á að safna 1,2 milljón undirskriftum sem þeir vilja kynna á þjóðþinginu í nóvember.
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country in the world and the Roman Catholic Church has always been opposed to the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The Brazilian Congress has been opposed to legalization for 10 years. Such civil unions are only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was put together by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed law, after its amendment, is now under the responsibility of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters plan to gather 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "Þegar fimm mínútur voru liðnar af viðburðinum byrjaði vindur að blása, um mínútu síðar var hann kominn upp í 70 km/klst. ... síðan kom rigningin, en af þvílíkum krafti og í stórum dropum sem stungu mann eins og nálar, síðan kom haglél, fólk varð skelfingu lostið og hrópaði og traðkaði hvert annað niður. Ég varð viðskila við systur mína og vinkonu hennar. Á leið minni þangað voru tveir fatlaðir einstaklingar í hjólastólum og fólk hoppaði yfir þá og ýtti þeim,"" sagði Armand Versace."
mt: "When five minutes had passed from the event, the wind began to blow, a minute later it was up to 70 km/h... then came the rain, of such force and in large drops that stung like needles, then came the hail, people were frightened and screamed and trampled each other. I was scared by my sister and her friend. On the way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs and people jumped over them and pushed them," said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Óveðrið, um 1040 km vestur af Grænhöfðaeyjum, mun líklega fara víðar og ógna síðan landsvæðum, segja veðurfræðingar. Fred er sem stendur með vindhraða upp á 105 mílur á klukkustund (165 km/klst.) og stefnir í norðvestur. Fred er öflugasta hitabeltislægð sögunnar þetta langt í suðaustur á Atlantshafinu frá tilkomu gervihnattamynda, og aðeins þriðji stóri fellibylurinn á skrá austan við 35. gráðu vestlægrar lengdar.
mt: 1040 km west of the Green Islands, the storm will likely move further and threaten land, say meteorologists. The wind is currently at 105 mph (165 km/h) and is heading northwest. The storm is the strongest hurricane ever recorded this far south in the Atlantic from the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane east of 35 degrees west longitude.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 802.11n staðallinn virkar á tíðnum 2,4 GHz og 5,0 GHz. Þetta auðveldar samhæfni við 802.11a, 802.11b og 802.11g, að því gefnu að grunnstöðin sé með tvöfald útvörp. Hraði 802.11n er verulega hraðari en forvera hans með hámarks fræðilegum afköstum sem nema 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n operates at times 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz. This allows compatibility with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual antennas. 802.11n is much faster than its predecessor with maximum theoretical throughput of up to 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Gullverðlaunahafinn á Ólympíuleikunum átti að synda 100 m og 200 m skriðsund og í þrjú boðsund á Samveldisleikunum en vegna kvartana hans hefur hreysti hans verið dregin í vafa. Hann hefur ekki getað tekið inn lyfin sem eiga að lina verkina þar sem þau eru bönnuð á leikunum.
mt: 100m and 200m sprinter and triple jumper at the Olympics was to run 100m and 200m at the Olympics and three jumps at the Commonwealth Games but due to his injury his hopes have been dashed. He has not been able to take the drugs that were to enhance his performance as they are banned at the games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Alþjóðlegt jarðskjálftakort Jarðfræðastofnunar Bandaríkjanna sýndi engin merki um jarðskjálfta á Íslandi vikuna þar á undan. Veðurstofa Íslands skýrði ekki frá neinni jarðskjálftavirkni á Heklusvæðinu síðustu 48 klukkustundir. Töluverða jarðskjálftavirknin sem leiddi til stigsbreytingarinnar fór fram 10. mars norðaustan við öskjuna á tindi eldfjallsins. Tilkynnt var um svört ský ótengd nokkurs konar eldvirkni við rætur fjallsins. Skýin sköpuðu möguleikann á ruglingi varðandi það hvort eldgos hefði í raun átt sér stað.
mt: 2010 eruption of Eyjafjallajökull
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

Veðurstofa Íslands skýrði ekki frá neinni jarðskjálftavirkni á Heklusvæðinu síðustu 48 klukkustundir. Töluverða jarðskjálftavirknin sem leiddi til stigsbreytingarinnar fór fram 10. mars norðaustan við öskjuna á tindi eldfjallsins. Tilkynnt var um svört ský ótengd nokkurs konar eldvirkni við rætur fjallsins. Skýin sköpuðu möguleikann á ruglingi varðandi það hvort eldgos hefði í raun átt sér stað.
mt: 2010 eruption of Eyjafjallajökull
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Ómannaða tunglfarið Chandrayaan-1 kastaði tunglkanna sínum (MIP), sem þeyttist yfir tunglyfirborðið á 1,5 km hraða á sekúndu (3000 mílur á klst.) og náði velheppnaðri brotlendingu nálægt suðurskauti tunglsins. Fyrir utan að innihalda þrjú mikilvæg vísindatæki, þá er tunglfarartækið einnig með mynd af indverska þjóðfánanum málaða á allar hliðar þess.
mt: The unmanned lunar probe Chandrayaan-1 ejected its moon impact probe (MIP), which impacted the lunar surface at 1.5 km/s (3,000 mph) and achieved a successful landing near the lunar south pole. In addition to containing three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe is also painted with an image of the Indian national flag on all sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Greint var frá fyrstu tilfellum sjúkdómsins á þessu tímabili, í lok júlí. Sjúkdómurinn berst með svínum og flyst síðan í menn með moskítóflugum. Faraldurinn hefur fengið indversk yfirvöld til að innleiða slíkar ráðstafanir, til dæmis dreifingu svínafangara á stöðum undir alvarlegum áhrifum, dreifingu þúsunda flugnaneta og úðunar skordýraeiturs. Einnig hafa yfirvöld lofað nokkrum milljón hettuglasa með bóluefni gegn heilabólgu. Það mun hjálpa heilbrigðisstofnunum við undirbúning fyrir næsta ár. Áform um bóluefni til dreifingar á þeim svæðum sem sögulega hafa orðið fyrir mestum áhrifum á þessu ári var seinkað vegna fjárskorts og lítillar forgangsröðunar miðað við aðra sjúkdóma.
mt: The first cases of the disease were reported in late July. The disease spreads from pigs to humans via mosquitoes. The authorities have been advised to implement such measures, such as distributing pig farms at sites under severe impact, distributing thousands of mosquito nets and spraying insecticide. The authorities have also promised several million doses of vaccine against polio. It will help health facilities prepare for next year. Plans to distribute vaccines in areas that have historically been most affected this year were delayed due to a lack of funds and low priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Fyrirhuguð breyting var samþykkt í báðum þingdeildum árið 2011. Breyting var gerð á löggjöfinni þegar fulltrúadeildin felldi brott aðra setninguna og hún var síðan samþykkt á svipuðu formi af öldungadeildinni á mánudeginum. Misbrestur á annarrar setningar, þar sem lagt er til bann við óvígðri sambúð fólks af sama kyni, gæti skapað möguleikann á óvígðri sambúð í framtíðinni. Eftir ferlið verður HJR-3 tekið til athugunar á nýjan leik af næstu kjörnu löggjafarsamkundu annaðhvort árið 2015 eða 2016 til að halda ferlinu gangandi.
mt: 2011, the bill was passed in both houses of parliament. The bill was amended when the lower house removed the second sentence and it was then passed in similar form by the upper house on Monday. A misstep in the second sentence, which bans same-sex marriage, could create the possibility of same-sex marriage in the future. After the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislative body either in 2015 or 2016 to keep the process going.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """Panamaskjölin"" er regnhlífarhugtak fyrir um það bil tíu milljónir skjala frá panamísku lögfræðistofunni Mossack Fonseca, sem lekið var til fjölmiðla vorið 2016. Skjölin sýndu fram á að 14 bankar aðstoðuðu ríka viðskiptavini sína að fela auð sem nam milljörðum Bandaríkjadala til að komast undan skattgreiðslum og öðrum reglum. Breska dagblaðið The Guardian gaf í skyn að Deutsche Bank hefði stýrt hartnær þriðjungi þeirra 1200 skúffufyrirtækja sem notuð voru til að koma þessu í kring. Mótmæli voru á heimsvísu, nokkrar saksóknir og leiðtogar ríkisstjórna Íslands og Pakistan sögðu báðir af sér."
mt: """Panama Papers"" is a term for about 11.5 million documents from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, which were leaked to the media in the spring of 2016. The documents showed that 14 banks helped their wealthy clients to hide billions of dollars in tax evasion and other rules. The British newspaper The Guardian estimated that Deutsche Bank had directed almost a third of the 1200 companies used to do this. Protests were worldwide, several prosecutions and leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both said.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Flugslys eru algeng í Íran, en flugflotinn er bæði gamall og skortur er á viðhaldi, bæði í almennum flugsamgöngum og herflugi. Alþjóðleg viðskiptabönn hafa valdið því ekki er hægt að kaupa nýjar flugvélar. Fyrr í vikunni dóu þrír og þrír í viðbót slösuðust þegar lögregluþyrla brotlenti. Í síðasta mánuði varð Íran fyrir versta flugslysi sínu í mörg ár þegar farþegaþota á leið til Armení hrapaði og 168 farþegar létust. Sama mánuð fór önnur farþegaþota út af flugbraut við Mashhad og keyrði á vegg. 17 manns misstu lífið.
mt: Flights are common in Iran, but the fleet is old and maintenance is lacking, both in general aviation and military aviation. International sanctions have prevented the purchase of new aircraft. Earlier in the week three died and three more were injured when a police helicopter crashed. Last month Iran suffered its worst air crash in years when a passenger plane crashed on its way to Armenia and 168 passengers died. The same month another passenger plane veered off the runway at Mashhad and crashed into a wall. 17 people died.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Rannsóknarhópurinn í Írak skýrði frá skýrslunni sinni kl. 12:00 GMT í dag. Hópurinn varar við því að enginn geti tryggt að nokkur aðgerðaráætlun í Írak þessa stundina geti stöðvað bardaga á milli sértrúarflokka, aukið ofbeldi eða glundroða. Í skýrslunni er fyrst farið fram á hreinskilnar samræður og myndun samstöðu í Bandaríkjunum um stefnuna er varðar Miðausturlönd. Skýrslan er mjög gagnrýnin á nánast alla þætti núverandi stefnu framkvæmdastjórnarinnar gagnvart Írak og hún hvetur tafarlaust til stefnubreytingar. Fyrsta tillagan af 78 var að taka ætti nýtt diplómatískt frumkvæði fyrir árslok til að tryggja landamæri Íraks gagnvart óvinveittum árásum og koma aftur á fót stjórnmálasambandi við nágrannaríkin.
mt: The Iraq Study Group released its report at noon GMT today. The group cautions that no current plan in Iraq can guarantee that any action taken by the United States in Iraq this year will end the civil war, increase security or reduce sectarian violence. The report first calls for a clean break in the United States on Iraq policy and the formation of a consensus in the United States on the way forward. The report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the current administration's policy towards Iraq and urges a change in direction. The first of 78 recommendations is to take a new diplomatic initiative for the year ahead to secure Iraq's borders against external aggression and to reestablish political relations with neighboring countries.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Samkvæmt Ansa ""hefur lögreglan áhyggjur af því að tvær árásir á æðstu ráðamenn gætu leitt til mikillar valdabaráttu. Lögreglan sagði að Lo Piccolo hefði yfirhöndina því hann var hægri hönd Provenzano í Palermo og að hans mikla reynsla hefði skapað virðingu hans á meðal eldri kynslóðar yfirmanna þar sem þeir fylgdu reglu Provenzano um að láta fara eins lítið fyrir sér og hægt væri á meðan þeir styrkja net sitt. Þessum yfirmönnum var haldið í skefjum af Provenzano þegar hann batt enda á Riina-stríðið gegn ríkinu sem kostaði líf mafíukrossfaranna Miovia Giovanni Falcone og Paolo Borsellino árið 1992."""
mt: "According to Ansa, the police have concerns that two attacks on top officials could lead to a power struggle. The police said that Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he was the right hand of Provenzano in Palermo and that his great experience had created respect for him among the older generation of bosses where they followed Provenzano's rule to do as little as possible while strengthening their network. These bosses were held in check by Provenzano when he ended the Riina war against the state which cost the lives of mafia godfathers Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Hinn japanski Judoka Hitoshi Saito, sem hlotið hefur tvenn gullverðlaun á Ólympíuleikum, er látinn 54 ára að aldri. Dánarorsökin var sögð vera gallvegakrabbamein í lifur. Hann lést í Osaka síðasta þriðjudag. Auk þess að vera fyrrverandi Ólympíu- og heimsmeistari var Saito formaður þjálfunarnefndar japanska júdósambandsins þegar hann lést.
mt: 54-year-old former Olympic and world judo champion Hitoshi Saito, who won two gold medals at the Olympics, died of gallbladder cancer in Osaka last Tuesday. In addition to being a former Olympic and world judo champion, Saito was chairman of the Japanese judo federation when he died.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Á ferðalagi sínu lenti Iwasaki margoft í vandræðum. Sjóræningjar rændu hann, hundur með hundaæði réðst á hann í Tíbet, hann slapp frá giftingu í Nepal og var handtekinn á Indlandi.
mt: On his travels, Iwasaki encountered many difficulties. Pirates kidnapped him, a dog with rabies attacked him in Tibet, he escaped death in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Á ferðalagi sínu lenti Iwasaki margoft í vandræðum. Sjóræningjar rændu hann, hundur með hundaæði réðst á hann í Tíbet, hann slapp frá giftingu í Nepal og var handtekinn á Indlandi.
mt: On his travels, Iwasaki encountered many difficulties. Pirates kidnapped him, a dog with rabies attacked him in Tibet, he escaped death in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella missti stjórn á bílnum og lauk kappakstrinum fljótlega eftir ræsingu. Fernando Alonso, liðsfélagi hans, leiddi keppnina lengst af en datt úr keppni stuttu eftir að hafa tekið þjónustuhlé, líklegast vegna vandræða með hægra framhjólið. Michael Schumacher lauk keppni ekki löngu á eftir Alonso, vegna fjöðrunarskemmda eftir margar rimmur þeirra í keppninni.
mt: 2009 Italian Grand Prix: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and retired early after a spin. Fernando Alonso, his teammate, led the race until he dropped out shortly after taking a pit stop, likely due to problems with his right front wheel. Michael Schumacher retired not long after Alonso, due to a tire failure after several of their laps in the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Á síðastliðnum 3 mánuðum voru yfir 80 af þeim handteknu sleppt eftir bókun án formlegar ákæru. Í apríl í ár setti Glynn dómari tímabundið nálgunarbann á stofnunina. Tilgangurinn var að frelsa alla fangana sem höfðu setið í haldi í meira en 24 klukkustundir eftir handtöku og höfðu ekki fengið áheyrn hjá héraðsdómara. Fulltrúinn ákveður trygginguna, ef hún er veitt, og formfestir ákærurnar sem sá sem handtók lagði fram. Ákærurnar eru síðan færðar inn í ríkistölvukerfið þar sem málið er rakið. Yfirheyrslan skapar einnig dag fyrir rétt hins grunaða á skjótum réttarhöldum.
mt: 80 of those arrested in the last three months have been released on bail without formal charges. In April, Judge Glynn imposed a temporary restraining order on the organization. The purpose was to free all prisoners who had been held for more than 24 hours after arrest and had not received a hearing before a district judge. The representative decides the bail, if it is granted, and the formal charges that the arresting officer filed. The charges are then entered into the national computer system where the case is processed. The hearing also creates a day for the accused at speedy trials.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin sagði einnig að embættismenn hefðu ákveðið að hætta við úrslitaviðureignina í kostnaðarskyni fyrir Afgani og vegna öryggisáhættu samfara öðrum kosningum. Diplómatar sögðust hafa fundið út að afganska stjórnarskráin væri nógu óljós til að sjá að ekki væri þörf á lokakosningunni. Þetta stangast á við fyrri fregnir sem sögðu að ef hætta yrði við viðbótarumferðina væri það brot gegn stjórnarskránni.
mt: The official said the decision to end the recount was made in the interest of saving money and for security reasons ahead of other elections. Diplomats said they had found that the Afghan constitution was too vague to require a runoff. This contradicts earlier reports that if the recount was ended it would be a violation of the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: Allt frá sjálfstæði Pakistans undan stjórn Bretlands árið 1947 hefur forseti Pakistans útnefnt „stjórnmálafulltrúa“ til að hafa umsjón með FATA. Þeir sinna nánast sjálfstæðu eftirliti með öllu með svæðunum. Þessir fulltrúar bera ábyrgð á að veita þjónustu og vegum stjórnvalda og dómsvalda samkvæmt 247. grein pakistönsku stjórnarskrárinnar.
mt: Since the independence of Pakistan from British rule in 1947, the President of Pakistan has appointed a "representative" to oversee the Federally Administered Tribal Areas. These representatives are almost completely independent of the government and judiciary, according to Article 247 of the Pakistani constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

These representatives are almost completely independent of the government and judiciary, according to Article 247 of the Pakistani constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Kvikmyndin með Ryan Gosling og Emma Stone hlaut tilnefningar í öllum helstu flokkum. Gosling og Stone voru tilnefnd sem besti aðalleikari og aðalleikkona. Tilnefningar voru einnig veittar fyrir bestu kvikmynd, leikstjóra, kvikmyndatöku, búningahönnun, klippingu, frumsamda tónlist, framleiðsluhönnun, hljóðklippingu, hljóðblöndun og frumsamið handrit. Tvö lög úr kvikmyndinni, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) og City of Stars, voru tilnefndar fyrir besta frumsanda kagup. Lionsgate kvikmyndaverið fé 26 tilnefningar — fleiri en nokkurt annað ver.
mt: La La Land  was nominated for all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress. Nominations were also given for Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing, Original Song and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the film,  Audition (The Fools Who Dream)  and  City of Stars, were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate's film received 14 nominations — more than any other film.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK skýrði líka frá því að starfsemi Kashiwazaki Kariwa-kjarnorkuversins í Niigata-héraðinu væri hefðbundin. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. sendi frá sér tilkynningu um að jarðskjálftinn hafi ekki haft áhrif á orkuverið og slökkt hafi verið á kjarnaofnum númer 1 og 2 í Shika kjarnorkuverinu. Tilkynnt var um að 9.400 heimili á svæðinu væru án rennandi vatns og u.þ.b. 100 heimili væru rafmagnslaus. Sumir vegir hafa orðið fyrir skemmdum, lestarþjónustan hefur orðið fyrir truflun á viðkomandi svæðum og Noto-flugvöllur í Ishikawa-héraði er enn lokaður.
mt: NHK also reported that operations at the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture were normal. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. sent a statement that the earthquake had not affected the power plant and operations had been stopped at the No. 1 and No. 2 reactors at the Shika nuclear power plant. It was reported that 9,400 homes in the area were without running water and about 100 homes were without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, public transportation has been affected in the area and the Noto airport in Ishikawa Prefecture is still closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Skjalið, samkvæmt lekanum, mun vísa til landamæradeilunnar, sem Palestína vill byggja á landamærunum fyrir Mið-Austurstríðið 1967. Önnur viðfangsefni sem fjallað er um fela í sér framtíðarríki Jerúsalem sem er heilög hjá báðum þjóðum og málefni Jórdandals. Ísrael krefst þess að herliðið verði áfram í dalnum í tíu ár eftir undirritun samningsins, en yfirvöld í Palestínu vilja hins vegar aðeins hafa herliðið á svæðinu í fimm ár.
mt: The document, according to the draft, will address the borders, which Palestine wants to build on the pre-1967 Middle East War borders. Other issues discussed include a future state of Jerusalem, which is holy to both nations and the issue of the Jordan Valley. Israel demands that the army remain in the valley for ten years after the signing of the agreement, but the authorities in Palestine, however, only want the army to be in the area for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "Ma fæddist í Hong Kong og stundaði nám við háskólann í New York og lögfræði við Harvard-háskóla og var eitt sinn með „græna kortið"" og fasta búsetu í Bandaríkjunum. Hsieh gaf í skyn þegar kosningarnar fóru fram að Ma kynni að flýja land um leið og neyðarástand yrði. Hsieh sagði einnig að hinn myndfríði Ma hugaði frekar að stíl en innihaldi. Þrátt fyrir ásakanirnar vann Ma þægilegan sigur með það á stefnuskránni að auka tengsl við meginland Kína."
mt: "Ma was born in Hong Kong and studied at New York University and law at Harvard and was once with the "green card" and a permanent residence in the United States. Hsieh said when the elections were announced that Ma knew to flee the country as soon as the emergency was. Hsieh also said that the beautiful Ma was more inclined to style than content. Despite the accusations, Ma won a comfortable victory with that on the agenda to increase ties with mainland China."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Þegar ljóst þótti að margar fjölskyldur myndu leita sér lögfræðiaðstoðar til að berjast gegn útburðinum, var haldinn fundur þann 20. mars í lagamiðstöð East Bay-samfélagsins fyrir fjölskyldurnar sem lentu í íbúðasvindlinu. Þegar leigjendurnir fór að segja frá hvað hafði komið fyrir, áttuðu flestar fjölskyldurnar sig á því að Carolyn Wilson hjá OHA hafði stolið tryggingafénu þeirra og stungið af úr bænum. Leigjendur í Lockwood Gardens telja að það geti verið um 40 fjölskyldur eða fleiri sem kunni að vera bornar út þar sem þau uppgötvuðu að OHA-lögreglan er að rannsaka annað opinbert íbúðarhúsnæði í Oakland sem gæti verið viðrinið húsnæðissvindlið.
mt: When it became clear that many families would seek legal advice to fight the eviction, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the families affected by the apartment complex. When the tenants began to tell what had happened, most families believed that Carolyn Wilson of OHA had stolen their insurance policy and kicked them out of the building. Tenants in Lockwood Gardens say it could be about 40 families or more who could be born out there as they discovered that OHA police are investigating another public housing in Oakland that could be the target of the apartment complex.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Eftir kappaksturinn heldur Keselowski forystunni í keppni ökumanna með 2250 stig. Johnson er sjö stigum á eftir með 2.243. Í þriðja sæti er Hamlin, tuttugu stigum á eftir, en fimm stigum á undan Bowyer. Kahne og Truex Jr. eru í fimmta og sjötta sæti með 2.220 og 2.207 stig. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth og Harvick eru í tíu efstu sætunum hvað ökumannameistaratitillinn varðar þegar fjórar keppnir eru eftir á tímabilinu.
mt: 2010 Chase for the Sprint Cup standings after the race:
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Talið er að þetta sé í fimmta sinn í sögunni þar sem staðfest er að efni frá Mars falli til jarðar og fólk fylgist með því. Aðeins hefur verið staðfest að 34 loftsteinar, af þeim um það bil 24.000 sem fallið hafa til jarðar, eigi uppruna sinn á Mars. Talið er að 15 steinanna tilheyri loftsteinadrífunni í júlí. Sumir steinarnir, sem eru mjög sjaldséðir á jörðinni, ganga kaupum og sölum fyrir að 11.000 Bandaríkjadölum til 22.500 Bandaríkjadala á únsuna, sem er um það bil tífalt hærra en verðið á gulli.
mt: 34 meteorites, of which about 24,000 have fallen to Earth, have been confirmed to originate from Mars. It is believed that 15 of the stones belong to the July 2018 meteor shower. Some of the stones, which are very rare on Earth, are sold for about $11,000 U.S. dollars to $22,500 U.S. dollars per ounce, which is about ten times more than the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher, sem lagði skóna á hilluna árið 2006 eftir að hafa unnið Formúlu 1 meistaratitilinn sjö sinnum, átti að fylla skarð Felipe Massa sem hafði orðið fyrir meiðslum. Brasilíumaðurinn hafði fengið alvarlega höfuðáverka eftir árekstur í ungverska kappakstrinum árið 2009. Massa verður frá það sem eftir lifir tímabilsins 2009.
mt: 2006 World Champion Michael Schumacher was to replace Felipe Massa, who had been seriously injured in a crash. The Brazilian had received severe head trauma after a crash in the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa will live on from that point forward.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Fram að þessu gat AOL hreyft við og þróað markaðinn fyrir snarskilaboð að eigin vild vegna hve útbreidd notkun þess var í Bandaríkjunum. Þegar þetta skipulag verður komið á kann það frelsi að hverfa. Fjöldi notenda Yahoo! og þjónustu Microsoft samanlagt mun jafna fjölda viðskiptavina AOL.
mt: Before this, AOL had been able to develop and expand its instant messaging market because of its widespread use in the United States. When this monopoly is broken, it will be free to leave. The number of Yahoo! and Microsoft users combined will equal the number of AOL's customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Bílsprengja sprakk í höfuðstöðvum lögreglunnar í Gaziantep, Tyrklandi í gærmorgun. Tveir lögregluþjónar létust og meira en tuttugu aðrir særðust. Samkvæmt embætti ríkisstjóra voru 19 þeirra slösuðu lögregluþjónar. Lögreglan sagðist gruna að meintur vígamaður Daesh (ISIL) bæri ábyrgð á árásinni.
mt: 19 police officers were injured and two were killed when a car bomb exploded outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, in the early morning. The government said 19 of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspected a Daesh (ISIL) suicide bomber was responsible.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Mitt Romney, fyrrum ríkisstjóri Massachusetts, vann forkosningar Repúblikanaflokksins í Flórída síðasta þriðjudag með yfir 46 prósent atkvæða. Fyrrum þingforseti fulltrúadeildarinnar, Newt Gingrich, var annar með 32 prósent. Í ríki þar sem sigurvegarinn fær alla fulltrúana fékk Romney alla fimmtíu fulltrúa Flórída og var því kominn með forystu í tilnefningu Repúblikanaflokksins fyrir forsetakosningarnar.
mt: Mitt Romney, former governor of Massachusetts, won the Republican primary in Florida last Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich was second with 32 percent. In a state where the winner takes all, Romney took all 50 delegates from Florida and was thus in the lead in the Republican nomination for the presidency.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "Newt Gingrich, fyrrum forseti fulltrúadeildarinnar, Rick Perry, ríkisstjóri Texas og þingkonan Michele Bachmann urðu í fjórða, fimmta og sjötta sæti. Gingrich hrósaði Santorum þegar niðurstöðurnar lágu fyrir en lét hvöss orð falla um Romney, sem hafði birt neikvæðar kosningaauglýsingar í Iowa gegn Gingrich. Perry sagði að hann myndi „snúa aftur til Texas til að leggja mat á árangur flokksstjórnarinnar í kvöld, ákvarða hvort framundan sé leið fyrir sjálfan mig í þessari baráttu"", en sagði síðar að hann myndi áfram taka þátt í baráttunni og taka þátt í prófkjörinu þann 21. janúar í Suður-Karólínu. Bachmann, sem vann óformlegu Ames-skoðanakönnunina í ágúst, ákvað að draga framboð sitt til baka."
mt: "Newt Gingrich, former Speaker of the House, Rick Perry, Governor of Texas, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann came in fourth, fifth, and sixth place. Gingrich taunted Santorum when the results were announced, but let loose on Romney, who had aired negative ads against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said he would "return to Texas tonight to assess the success of our campaign, and decide whether or not there is a path forward for me in this fight," but later said he would continue to participate in the race and participate in the primary on January 21 in South Carolina. Bachmann, who won the unscientific Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to withdraw her candidacy."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "Vefsíða stöðvarinnar lýsir þættinum sem ""útvarpsleikhúsi af gamla skólanum með nýju og svívirðilegu nördaívafi!"" Þegar þátturinn hóf göngu sína var hann einungis spilaður í hinu rótgróna netútvarpi TogiNet Radio, sem er aðallega talmálsútvarpsstöð. Síðari hluta árs 2015 stofnaði TogiNet útvarpsstöðina AstroNet sem dótturstöð. Upphaflegir raddleikarar voru áhugamenn í þættinum og heimafólk frá Austur-Texas."
mt: "The website describes the show as ""radio playhouse of the old school with new and awesome sound effects!"" When the show began, it was only broadcast on the TogiNet Radio, which is primarily a talk radio station. Later in 2015, TogiNet launched the daughter station AstroNet. The original cast members were fans of the show and family from East Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Árásarmennirnir í Mumbai ferðuðust bátleiðis þann 26. nóvember 2008 og voru með í fórum sér handsprengjur, sjálfvirk vopn og og réðust á mörg skotmörk, þar á meðal hina fjölmennu Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus-lestarstöð og hið fræga Taj Mahal-hótel. Njósnir og upplýsingaöflun David Headley hjálpaði til við að hrinda af stað aðgerð tíu vígamanna frá herskáum hópi Laskhar-e-Taiba frá Pakistan. Árásin setti mikið álag á samskipti Indlands og Pakistan.
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers traveled by boat and were armed with grenades, automatic weapons and attacked several targets, including the Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. David Headley's intelligence and information gathering helped foil a ten-man team of Pakistani Lashkar-e-Taiba militants. The attack disrupted Indian and Pakistani communications.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "Fyrri árangur Nadal gegn Kanadabúanum er 7–2. Hann tapaði nýverið fyrir Raonic á opna mótinu í Brisbane. Nadal fékk 88% af þeim stigum sem í boði voru og vann sér inn 76 stig í fyrstu lotu. Konungur leirsins hafði þetta að segja eftir leikinn: ""Ég er bara mjög spenntur yfir því að komast í lokaumferð mikilvægustu mótanna. Ég er mættur hingað til að vinna mótið."""
mt: "Nadal's previous result against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost to Raonic at the Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% of the points available and won 76 points in the first set. The king of clay had this to say after the match: ""I'm just really excited to get to the final of the biggest tournaments. I'm ready to win this match."""
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Í síðustu viku skýrði Naked News frá því að það myndi stórauka framboð sitt á alþjóðlegu tungumálum í fréttaflutningi með þremur nýjum útsendingum. Þetta er alþjóðlegt fyrirtæki sem flytur fréttur á ensku og japönsku og ætlar að framleiða þætti á spænsku, ítölsku og kóresku fyrir sjónvarp, netið og fartæki.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced that it would expand its international offerings with three new shows. This is an international company that delivers news in English and Japanese and plans to produce shows in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, the Internet and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
