src: Dr. Lee lýsti einnig yfir áhyggjum sínum varðandi tilkynningar um börn í Tyrklandi sem hafi sýkst af fuglainflúensunni A(H5N1) án þess að veikjast. Sumar rannsóknir benda til þess að sjúkdómurinn verði að verða minna banvænn áður en hann getur skapað heimsfaraldur, sagði hann. Það er áhyggjuefni að sjúklingar geti haldið áfram að smita fleira fólk með því að sinna daglegum venjum sínum ef inflúensueinkennin eru áfram væg.
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern about reports of children in Turkey who tested positive for the avian influenza A(H5N1) virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest the disease may be less deadly before it can cause a pandemic, he said. It is worrisome that patients could continue to infect others by following their normal routines if the symptoms are mild.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Aðfaranótt 9. ágúst var fellibylurinn Morakot um sjötíu kílómetra frá kínverska héraðinu Fujian. Gert er ráð fyrir fellibylurinn muni færast í átt til Kína á 11 km hraða á klukkustund.
mt: 9 August, Typhoon Morakot was 60 km from Fujian, China. It is expected to move towards China at 11 km/hour.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: George W. Bush forseti Bandaríkjanna kom til Singapúr að morgni 16. nóvember, í upphafi vikulangrar ferðar sinnar um Asíu. Wong Kan Seng staðgengill forsætisráðherra Singapúr tók á móti honum og þar á eftir ræddi hann við Lee Hsien Loong forsætisráðherra Singapúr um málefni er tengdust viðskiptum og hryðjuverkum. Eftir viku af kosningaósigrum ræddi Bush við áhorfendur um aukin viðskiptaumsvif í Asíu.
mt: 16 November 2004: George W. Bush, President of the United States, arrived in Singapore in the morning of 16 November, at the start of a week-long tour of Asia. Wong Kan Seng, Deputy Prime Minister of Singapore, received him and they then discussed matters related to trade and terrorism. After a week of election victories, Bush spoke to an audience about increased trade opportunities in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Tilkynningin í dag framlenging einnig skuldbindingu stjórnvalda sem gefin var í mars fyrr á þessu ári um að úthluta fé fyrir fleiri vagna. Nú verður 300 vögnum bætt við og því verður samtals 1300 vögnum bætt við til að draga úr mannþrönginni.
mt: 300 more vehicles were added to the fleet, bringing the total to 1300.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: "Hún sagði: ""Engar leyniþjónustur lýsa því yfir að árás sé væntanleg yfirvofandi. Þrátt fyrir að hættustigið sé fært niður í alvarlegt stig þýðir slíkt ekki að öll hættan sé enn yfirstaðin."""
mt: "She said: ""No intelligence services have indicated that an attack is imminent. Despite the fact that the threat level has been lowered to serious, this does not mean that all the threat is over."""
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly sór í gær í embætti níu aðila í bráðabirgðakjörstjórn (CEP). Þetta er fimmta bráðabirgðakosningaráð (CEP) Martelly á fjórum árum. Í síðasta mánuði mælti forsetanefnd með því að CEP myndi láta af störfum sem hluti af aðgerðarpakka til að færa landið í átt að nýjum kosningum. Stjórnskipaða nefndin var svar Martelly við víðtækum mótmælum gegn yfirvöldum sem hófust í október. Mótmælin, sem voru stundum með ofbeldi, fóru af stað vegna þess að kosningar voru ekki haldnar, ákveðnar kosningar áttu að fara fram árið 2011.
mt: Martelly appointed a new nine-member CEP on Sunday. This is the fourth CEP appointed by Martelly in four years. Last month, the president's council recommended that the CEP step down as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The governing council was the president's response to widespread protests against the government that began in October. The protests, sometimes violent, were sparked by the fact that elections were not held, scheduled elections were to be held in 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: USA Gymnastics styður bréf Ólympíunefndar Bandaríkjanna og viðurkennir ótakmarkaða þörf Ólympíufjölskyldunnar til að vinna að öruggu umhverfi fyrir alla íþróttamenn okkar. Við erum sammála yfirlýsingu USOC að hagsmunir íþróttafólks okkar, félaga og íþrótta þeirra sé betur gert með því að halda áfram með raunverulegri breytingu innan sambandsins, frekar en að skilja eftir auða jörð. USA Gymnastics styður sjálfstæða rannsókn sem getur varpað ljósi á hvernig misnotkun, af því umfangi sem lýst er af slíku hugrekki af þeim sem máttu líða af hendi Larry Nassar, gat viðgengist óséð svo lengi og fagnar öllum breytingum sem nauðsynlegar og viðeigandi eru USA Gymnastics og USOC hafa sama markmið — að gera fimleika og aðrar íþróttir eins öruggar og hægt er svo íþróttafólk geti látið drauma sína rætast í öruggu, jákvæðu og valdefldu umhverfi.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the statement of the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the urgent need of our Olympic community to create a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC’s statement that the interests of our athletes, members and their families are better served by continuing to make real change within the organization, rather than walking away from the opportunity. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that can shed light on how abuse, of the nature described by those who have been impacted by Larry Nassar, has been allowed to persist for so long and applauds all changes that are necessary and appropriate that USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal – to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible so athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and supportive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: "Sjóher Bandaríkjanna lýsti því einnig yfir að vera að rannsaka atvikið. Þeir sögðu einnig í yfirlýsingu að ""áhöfnin vinnur að því að skilgreina bestu aðferðina við að fjarlægja skipið á öruggan hátt"". Hér var um að ræða tundurduflaslæðara í Avenger flokki sem var á leiðinni til Puerto Princesa í Palawan. Skipið tilheyrir 7. flota bandaríska sjóhersins og bækistöð þess er í Sasebo, Nakasaki í Japan."
mt: "The U.S. Navy also announced it was investigating the incident. It said in a statement that ""the ship is working to safely remove the material"" and that it was referring to a fire-control radar in the Avenger class of ship that was en route to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. The ship belongs to the 7th Fleet of the U.S. Navy and its base is in Sasebo, Nakasaki, Japan."
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Þegar langt var liðið á sunnudaginn tilkynnti Donald Trump, forseti Bandaríkjanna, í yfirlýsingu sem í gegnum fjölmiðlafulltrúa sinn, að bandarískir hermenn myndu yfirgefa Sýrland. Tilkynningin var send eftir símtal Trumps við Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, sem er forseti Tyrklands. Tyrkland myndi einnig taka við því að halda vörð um bardagamenn ISIS, en í tilynningunni stóð að ríki Evrópu hafðu neitað að taka við aftur.
mt: On Sunday, Donald Trump, President of the United States, announced in a statement relayed through his press secretary, that American troops would be leaving Syria. The statement was made after a phone call between Trump and Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, President of Turkey. Turkey would also take over the responsibility of guarding ISIS fighters, as the statement said that European countries had refused to take them back.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Þegar langt var liðið á sunnudaginn tilkynnti Donald Trump, forseti Bandaríkjanna, í yfirlýsingu sem í gegnum fjölmiðlafulltrúa sinn, að bandarískir hermenn myndu yfirgefa Sýrland. Tilkynningin var send eftir símtal Trumps við Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, sem er forseti Tyrklands. Tyrkland myndi einnig taka við því að halda vörð um bardagamenn ISIS, en í tilynningunni stóð að ríki Evrópu hafðu neitað að taka við aftur.
mt: On Sunday, Donald Trump, President of the United States, announced in a statement relayed through his press secretary, that American troops would be leaving Syria. The statement was made after a phone call between Trump and Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, President of Turkey. Turkey would also take over the responsibility of guarding ISIS fighters, as the statement said that European countries had refused to take them back.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Bandalagshermenn og afganski herinn mættu á staðinn og afmörkuðu svæðið og aðrar bandalagsflugvélar hafa verið sendar til aðstoðar. Brotlendingin átti sér stað hátt uppi í fjalllendi og er talið að hún hafi verið afleiðing skotárásar frá óvinum. Slæmt veður og erfiðar aðstæður hafa torveldað leitina að brotlendingarstaðnum.
mt: Coalition troops and the Afghan army arrived at the scene and cordoned off the area and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in the mountains and is believed to be the result of an attack by the enemy. Bad weather and difficult conditions have hampered the search for the crash site.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Hægt var að koma í veg fyrir árstíðabundin flóð sem dreifðu setlagi um ána með byggingu stíflunnar árið 1963. Botnfallið var nauðsynlegt svo að sandrif og strendur yrðu til sem gegndu hlutverki náttúruverndarsvæðis. Fyrir vikið hafa tvær fisktegundir dáið út og aðrar tvær eru í útrýmingarhættu, þ.m.t. tegund af hnúðlaxi. Vatnshæðin hækkar eingöngu um nokkur fet eftir flóð, en embættismenn vonast eftir því að slíkt nægi til að endurheimta veðruð sandrif neðar í streymi.
mt: 1963 construction of a dam prevented seasonal floods that spread silt along the river. The bottom fall was necessary so that sand riffs and beaches could serve as habitats for natural reserves. Two fish species have gone extinct and two others are in danger of extinction, including a type of salmon. Water levels only rise a few feet after floods, but officials hope that this will be enough to recover the sand riffs downstream.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "Bandaríska sendiráðið í Naíróbí í Kenýa hefur sent frá sér viðvörun um að „öfgamenn frá Sómalíu“ hafi hug á að hefja sjálfsmorðsárásir í Kenýa og Eþíópíu. Bandaríkjamenn segist hafa fengið upplýsingar frá ónefndum aðila sem sérstaklega nefnir notkun sjálfsmorðsárásarmanna til að sprengja ""áberandi kennileiti"" í Eþíópíu og Kenýa."
mt: "The U.S. Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, has issued a warning that "Somali extremists" are planning suicide attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. U.S. officials say they have received information from unnamed sources that the suicide bombers will target "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "Hinir þekktu  grísku lögfræðingar, Sakis Kechagioglou og George Nikolakopoulos, hafa verið fangelsaðir í Korydallu í Aþenu þar sem þeir voru fundnir sekir um svindl og spillingu. Þar af leiðandi hefur þetta valdið miklu hneyksli innan gríska réttarkerfisins þar sem ólögmætar aðgerðir dómara, lögmanna, héraðsdómslögmanna og lögfræðinga síðastliðinna ára hafa verið afhjúpaðar. Nokkrum vikum eftir að blaðamaðurinn Makis Triantafylopoulos birti upplýsingarnar í sjónvarpsþættinum sínum vinsæla, ""Zoungla"" á Alpha TV, var þingmaðurinn og lögfræðingurinn Petros Mantouvalos settur af vegna fjármálaspillingar starfsmanna á skrifstofu hans. Evangelos Kalousis, einn þekktasti dómarinn, var að auki fangelsaður þar sem hann dæmdur sekur vegna spillingar og úrkynjaðrar hegðunar."
mt: "The famous Greek lawyers, Saki Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos, have been imprisoned in Korydallos in Athens where they were found guilty of fraud and embezzlement. This has caused a great upheaval within the Greek legal system where the illegal actions of judges, prosecutors, district attorneys and lawyers in recent years have been exposed. A few weeks after the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos published the information in his popular show, "Zoungla" on Alpha TV, the MP and lawyer Petros Mantouvalos was removed from office due to embezzlement of his staff. Evangelos Kalousis, one of the most famous judges, was also imprisoned where he was found guilty of embezzlement and improper conduct."
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa náði flestum stigum lotunnar, 70 hlaup með aðeins 41 boltum með því að slá 11 fjarka og tvær sexur. Kylfar í milliröð, Sachin Tendulkar og Rahul Dravid, stóðu sig vel og luku saman hundrað hlaupum. En eftir að hafa tapað marksúlu fyrirliðans skoraði Indland aðeins 36 stig og tapaði 7 marksúlum áður en lotunni lauk.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the most runs, 70 with only 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and two sixes. The openers, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, did well and scored a hundred runs. But after losing the captain's wicket, India scored only 36 runs and lost 7 wickets before the innings ended.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: "Adam Cuerden, stjórnandi Commons, lét í ljós óánægju sína með fjarlægingarnar þegar hann talaði við Wikinews í síðasta mánuði. ""Hann [Wales] laug að okkur alveg frá byrjun. Í fyrsta lagi með því að þykjast gera slíkt af lagalegum ástæðum. Í öðru lagi með því að þykjast hlusta á okkur þar til hann eyðilagði listaverkin sín."" Gremja samfélagsins leiddi til núverandi viðleitni til að setja saman stefnu varðandi kynferðislegt efni fyrir síðuna sem hýsir milljónir miðla með opið leyfi."
mt: "Adam Cuerden, the head of Commons, revealed his displeasure with the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.  'He [Wales] cut us off completely from the beginning.  First of all, by claiming to do so for legal reasons.  Secondly, by claiming to listen to us until he destroyed his works.'  The social media backlash led to the current attempt to set a policy for the site that hosts millions of media with open licenses."
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "Ekki voru allir fylgjandi því að konur fengu að skrá sig. Silfurverðlaunahafinn á Ólympíuleikunum árið 2004, Amir Khan sagði eftirfarandi: ""Innst inni finnst mér ekki að konur ættu að berjast. Þetta er mín skoðun."" Hann lýsti því yfir, þrátt fyrir það sem hann hafði sagt, að hann myndi styðja keppendurna frá Bretlandi á Ólympíuleikunum í London árið 2012."
mt: "Not all were allowed to sign up because women were not allowed to fight. The silver medalist at the 2004 Olympics, Amir Khan said, "I don't think women should fight. That's my opinion." He later stated that he would support the British fighters at the 2012 Olympics in London."
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, 13 ára keppnismaður á mótorhjóli, lést eftir árekstur á Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Í upphituninni féll Lenz af hjólinu og varð fyrir öðrum keppanda, Xavier Zayat. Hann fékk umsvifalaust læknisaðstoð við brautina og var fluttur á sjúkrahús í nágrenninu þar sem hann síðar lést. Zayat meiddist ekki í slysinu.
mt: 13-year-old motorcyclist Peter Lenz died after a collision at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. In the opening lap, Lenz fell off his bike and was hit by another competitor, Xavier Zayat. He received immediate medical attention at the track and was taken to a nearby hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Fólk af öllum aldri og mismunandi bakgrunni getur verið hrætt í flugvél, einkum ef það hefur ekki flogið áður eða orðið fyrir áfalli. Þetta er ekkert til að skammast sín fyrir: engin munur er á þessu og persónulegri hræðslu og óbeit á öðrum hlutum sem margir einstaklingar hafa. Fyrir suma gæti smá skilningur á hvernig flugvélar virka og hvað gerist í flugi hjálpað til við að yfirstíga ótta sem byggir á hinu óþekkta eða að hafa ekki stjórn á aðstæðum.
mt: People of all ages and backgrounds can be afraid of flying, especially if they have not flown before or have experienced an incident. This is nothing to be ashamed of: no difference is made between this and personal fear and anxiety about other things that many individuals have. For some, a small understanding of how airplanes work and what happens in flights may help to overcome fear based on the unknown or not having control over circumstances.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Í dag er flug sjaldan bókað í gegnum flugfélagið án þess að fyrst sé leitað að verðum og þau borin saman. Stundum getur verið mjög mismunandi verð á sama flugi hjá mismunandi fyrirtækjum og það borgar sig að bera saman leitarniðurstöður og að skoða einnig vefsíðu flugfélagsins áður en bókað er.
mt: Today, flights are rarely booked through an airline without first checking prices and comparing them. Sometimes the price for the same flight can be very different between different companies and it pays to compare search results and also look at the airline's website before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Flutningafyrirtæki fá vel borgað fyrir snögga afhendingu. Oft og tíðum skiptir tíminn miklu máli hvað varðar viðskiptaskjöl, varning eða varahluti fyrir áríðandi viðgerðir. Á sumum leiðum eru stærri fyrirtækin með sínar eigin flugvélar en vandamál var til staðar fyrir aðrar leiðir og minni fyrirtæki. Ef þau sendu vörur með flugfrakt tók marga daga á sumum flugleiðum að afferma og tollskoða. Eina leiðin til flýta fyrir því var sú að senda það sem innritaðan farangur. Reglur flugfélaga gerir þeim ekki kleift að senda farangur án farþega, en þar kemur þú til skjalanna.
mt: Shipping companies are well compensated for speedy delivery. Often times, time is of the essence when it comes to invoices, warnings or parts for upcoming repairs. In some cases, larger companies have their own aircraft while problems were present for other ways and smaller companies. If they sent goods by air freight, it took many days on some flight routes to clear and customs inspect. The only way to escape this was to send it as a freighter. Airline regulations do not allow them to send freight without passengers, but you come to the paperwork.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Flugfélög sem eru í samstarfi þarf að velja vandlega. Flestir telja best að gerast meðlimir flugfélaga sem ferðast er oftast með, en fólk ætti að hafa í huga að sérréttindi og vildarpunktar kunna að vera betri hjá öðru flugfélagi innan sömu samtaka flugrekenda.
mt: Airlines should carefully choose their partners. Most people prefer to be members of an airline they fly with most often, but people should consider that special privileges and perks may be better with another airline within the same alliance of airlines.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Drekka skal áfenga drykki í hófi. Alkóhól hefur mismunandi áhrif á fólk og mikilvægt er að þekkja sín mörk. Möguleg langtíma heilbrigðisáhrif vegna ofdrykkju geta falið í sér lifrarskemmdir og jafnvel blindu og dauða. Möguleg hætta eykst þegar er áfengis sem er ólöglega framleitt. Ólöglegt áfengi getur innihaldið ýmis hættuleg óhreinindi, þar á meðal metanól sem veldur blindu eða dauða jafnvel í litlum skömmtum.
mt: 1. Drink responsibly. Alcohol affects people differently and it is important to know your limits. Possible long-term health effects of overindulgence can include liver damage and even blindness and death. Possible harm increases when alcohol is illegally produced. Illegally produced alcohol can contain various dangerous contaminants, including methanol which can cause blindness or death even in small amounts.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Síkjahverfið (hollenska: Grachtengordel) er hið fræga 17. aldar hverfi sem umkringir Binnenstad í Amsterdam. Allt umdæmið er tilnefnt sem staður á heimsminjaskrá UNESCO sökum hins einstaka menningarlega og sögulega gildis og eignargildi hans sem er með því mesta innan landsins.
mt: The Grachtengordel (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district that surrounds the Binnenstad in Amsterdam. The entire district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site due to its unique cultural and historical significance and its highest property value within the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, í 12 km fjarlægð suðvestan af Siem Reap. Musterið á hæðinni var smíðað í lok 9. aldar á valdatíma Yasovarman kóngs. Drunga andrúmsloft musterisins og útsýnið yfir Tonle Sap-vatnið gerir gönguna upp á hæðina þess virði. Hægt er að skoða svæðið og fara síðan í bátsferð á vatninu. Fara þarf um Angkor-skarðið til að komast inn í musterið svo ekki gleyma að taka vegabréfið með þegar haldið er til Tonle Sap.
mt: 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. The temple was built in the late 9th century during the reign of Yasovarman. The view from the temple's terrace over Tonle Sap lake makes the climb worthwhile. The area can be visited and then a boat trip on the lake can be taken. A pass is required to enter the temple through Angkor's gate, so don't forget to bring it when going to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Suðurskautslandið er kaldasti staður á jörðinni og liggur umhverfis suðurskautið. Heimsóknir ferðamanna eru dýrar, krefjast hreysti, eru aðeins mögulegar að sumri, nóvember til febrúar og eru einkum takmarkaðar við skagann, eyjarnar og Rosshafið. Hér hafa búsetu nokkur þúsund starfsmenn í um 50 stöðvum aðallega á þessum svæðum. Fáir hafa hér vetursetu. Meginland Suðurskautslandsins er auð slétta sem er hulin 2–3 km af ís. Flugferðir undir handleiðslu sérfræðinga fara inn í landið, vegna fjallgöngu eða á Pólinn en þar er stór stöð.
mt: The Antarctic is the coldest, driest and windiest continent and is almost entirely south of the Antarctic Circle. Human activity is primarily concentrated in the summer months of December to February, and there are no inhabitants. Most of the year the continent is covered in ice that is, in places, up to 4 km (2.5 mi) thick. There are some 2000–3000 summer residents who maintain research stations. The land is mostly barren rock, mountains and ice, but accounts for 8.9% of the earth's land area, comprising most of the Southern Hemisphere, and nearly a third of all the land on Earth. The continent is divided into two large regions: West Antarctica and East Antarctica. West Antarctica is mostly composed of mountains, valleys, glaciers, and ice fields, with elevations generally between 2000 and 4000 m (6600 and 13,100 ft). East Antarctica is characterized by a high central plateau covered by an ice sheet that is, in places, over 4 km (2.5 mi) thick and averages at least 2.5 km (1.6 mi) thick. The continent has no permanent human habitation and is host to a vast and unique array of life forms. Though its environment remains harsh, Antarctica is a popular destination for tourists in the summer and draws scientists who come to do research.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Eldri stjörnuathugunarstöðvar eru yfirleitt úreltar í dag en þjóna tilgangi sem söfn eða fræðslustaðir. Þar sem ljósmengun á upphafsdögum þeirra var ekki sama vandamálið og það er í dag eru þær yfirleitt í borgum eða á háskólalóðum þar sem er auðveldara að komast að þeim en þeim sem hafa verið reistar á okkar tímum. Flestir nútíma rannsóknarsjónaukar eru á gríðarstórum starfsstöðvum á afskekktum svæðum þar sem lofthjúpsaðstæður eru hagstæðar.
mt: Older astronomical observatories are usually outdated today, but serve as museums or educational centers. As the light pollution at their inception was not the same as it is today, they are usually located in cities or on college campuses where it is easier to get to them than those that have been built in our time. Most modern telescopes are located on large research facilities in remote areas where the atmospheric conditions are favorable.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Margar strendur eru þar því Auckland liggur á milli tveggja hafna. Þær vinsælustu eru á þremur svæðum. Strandlengja North Shore (í North Harbor-hverfinu) liggur við Kyrrahafið og teygir sig frá Long Bay í norðri til Devonport í suðri. Næstum allar strendurnar eru sandstrendur þar sem öruggt er að synda og pohutukawa-tré veita skugga. Strendur Tamaki Drive eru við Waitemata-höfnina í fyrsta flokks úthverfum Mission Bay og St Heliers í Central Auckland. Þetta eru stundum fjölmennar fjölskyldustrendur með góðu úrvali af verslunum við ströndina. Sund er öruggt.
mt: Many beaches are there because Auckland lies between two harbours. The most popular are on three areas. North Shore (in North Harbour suburb) lies by the Pacific Ocean and stretches from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. Almost all beaches are sand beaches where it is safe to swim and pohutukawa trees provide shade. Beaches Tamaki Drive are by Waitemata Harbour in first class suburb Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. This are sometimes crowded family beaches with good selection of shops by the beach. The water is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Munið að þetta er í raun heimsókn að fjöldagröf sem og stað sem er með næstum ótvíræða merkingu fyrir stóran hluta jarðarbúa. Enn eru margir karlar og konur á lífi sem lifðu veruna af hér og miklu fleiri sem áttu ástvini sem voru myrtir eða unnu til dauða þar, jafnt gyðingar sem ekki gyðingar. Vinsamlegast sýndu þá virðingu og alvarleika sem staðurinn á skilið. Ekki grínast með helförina eða nasista. Ekki spilla svæðinu með merkingum eða rispa veggjakrot á mannvirki.
mt: This is a visit to a mass grave and a site with almost undeniable meaning for a large part of the world's population. Many men and women are alive who lived through the event and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or died of disease there, both Jews and non-Jews. Please show respect and seriousness for the site. Don't make fun of the mass grave or the Nazis. Don't deface the area with graffiti or damage the man-made structures.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Aukamál eru tilbúin tungumál sem búin eru til í þeim tilgangi að koma á samskiptum milli fólks sem ætti annars erfitt með samskipti. Þau eru aðskilin frá samskiptamálum, sem eru náttúruleg eða lífræn tungumál sem verða ríkjandi af einni eða annarri ástæðu sem samskiptatæki milli mælenda annarra tungumála.
mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed languages designed to facilitate communication between people who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are distinct from natural or biological languages that become widespread for one or more reasons as communication tools between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Áður en farið er með ferju yfir Norður-Eystrasaltið yfir vetrartímann er best að athuga staðsetningu káetunnar, því hávaðinn við að sigla í gegnum ís getur verið ærandi fyrir viðkvæmt fólk. Skemmtisiglingar Saint Petersburg fela í sér tíma í borginni. Farþegar á skemmtiferðaskipum eru undanþegnir kröfum um vegabréfsáritun (kynntu þér skilmálana).
mt: Before crossing the North Sea during the winter, it is best to check the location of the iceberg, as the cold can be dangerous for the sensitive. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in the city. Passengers on pleasure ships are exempt from the requirement for a driving license (know the terms).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Opinber tungumál í Barcelona eru katalónska og spænska. Um það bil helmingur íbúa vill frekar tala katalónsku, stór hluti íbúa skilur hana og nánast allir skilja spænsku. Flest götuskilti eru samt sem áður aðeins á katalónsku vegna þess að tungumálið er lögfest sem aðaltungumál héraðsins. Engu að síður er spænska einnig notuð víða í almenningssamgöngum og öðrum mannvirkjum. Reglulegar tilkynningar í neðanjarðarlestinni fara aðeins fram á katalónsku en óskipulagðar truflanir eru tilkynntar með sjálfvirku kerfi á fjölmörgum tungumálum, þar á meðal spænsku, ensku, frönsku, arabísku og japönsku.
mt: Official languages in Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. About half of the population prefers to speak Catalan, most of the population understands it and almost everyone understands Spanish. Most street signs are still only in Catalan because the language is officially recognized as the regional language. Spanish is also used widely in public transport and other public works. Regular announcements in the subway are only in Catalan but unannounced disruptions are announced by an automatic system in many languages, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Opinber tungumál í Barcelona eru katalónska og spænska. Um það bil helmingur íbúa vill frekar tala katalónsku, stór hluti íbúa skilur hana og nánast allir skilja spænsku. Flest götuskilti eru samt sem áður aðeins á katalónsku vegna þess að tungumálið er lögfest sem aðaltungumál héraðsins. Engu að síður er spænska einnig notuð víða í almenningssamgöngum og öðrum mannvirkjum. Reglulegar tilkynningar í neðanjarðarlestinni fara aðeins fram á katalónsku en óskipulagðar truflanir eru tilkynntar með sjálfvirku kerfi á fjölmörgum tungumálum, þar á meðal spænsku, ensku, frönsku, arabísku og japönsku.
mt: Official languages in Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. About half of the population prefers to speak Catalan, most of the population understands it and almost everyone understands Spanish. Most street signs are still only in Catalan because the language is officially recognized as the regional language. Spanish is also used widely in public transport and other public works. Regular announcements in the subway are only in Catalan but unannounced disruptions are announced by an automatic system in many languages, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Innan þróaðra landa í dag er framboð á lúxusgistingu með morgunverði orðið að nokkurs konar listgrein. Heimagistingar snúast fyrst og fremst um tvennt: gistiaðstöðu og morgunverð. Því er hægt að finna glæsilegan sængurfatnað og jafnvel handgerða rúmábreiðu eða rúm í fornum stíl í fínustu verslunum af slíkum toga. Morgunverðurinn getur samanstaðið af árstíðarbundnu góðmeti frá héraðinu eða sérrétti gestgjafans. Sögusviðið gæti verið söguleg gömul bygging með antíkhúsgögnum, vel hirtum garði og sundlaug.
mt: In developed countries today, the provision of luxury breakfasts has become a kind of art. Homestays are primarily about two things: accommodation and breakfast. It is possible to find luxurious bedding and even handmade tablecloths or rooms in the old style in the finest shops of such things. Breakfast can be composed of seasonal produce from the region or a speciality of the host. The setting could be a historic building with antique furniture, well-tended garden and swimming pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Borgin Peking í Kína verður gistiborg vetrarólympíuleikanna árið 2022 sem gerir hana að fyrstu borginni sem hefur haldið bæði sumar- og vetrarólympíuleika. Peking mun halda setningar- og lokaathöfnina og skautaíþróttir innanhúss. Aðrir skíðaviðburðir verða á Taizicheng-skíðasvæðinu í Zhangjiakou í um 220 km fjarlægð frá Peking.
mt: Beijing, China will be the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and shooting events indoors. Other skiing events will be held at the Zhangjiakou Skiing Area in Taizicheng, about 220 km away from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Fuglaflensa, eða fuglainflúensa, getur sýkt bæði fugla og spendýr. Færri en þúsund tilfelli í mönnum hafa verið skráð, en sum þeirra hafa leitt til dauða. Flest tengist fólki sem hefur atvinnu af alifuglum en fuglaskoðarar eru einnig í ákveðinni hættu.
mt: Avian influenza, or bird flu, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than 1,000 human cases have been recorded, but some have led to death. Most have been associated with people who work with poultry, but bird watchers are also at risk.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Víkinigarnir notuðu vatnaleiðir í Rússlandi til að komast í Svartahafið og Kaspíahafið. Hluti þeirra leiða er enn hægt að nota. Athugið hvort sækja þurfi um sérstök leyfi, en slíkt getur verið erfitt að fá. Skurðurinn frá Hvíta hafi til Eystrasalts tengir Norður-Íshafið við Eystrasaltið, um Onegavatn, Ladogavatn eða Sankti Pétursborg, aðallega með ám og vötnum. Onega-vatn er einnig tengt Volgu, svo það er enn mögulegt að koma frá Kaspíahafi í gegnum Rússland.
mt: The Vikings used waterways in Russia to get to the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Some of these routes are still usable. Note that you may need special permits, which can be difficult to obtain. The White Sea to the Baltic Sea connects the North Sea to the Baltic Sea, mainly through rivers and lakes. Onega Lake is also connected to the Volga, so it is still possible to get from the Caspian Sea through Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Útlendingaeftirlit er yfirleitt fyrsta skoðunin þegar gengið er frá borði við komu með flugvél, skipi eða öðrum farartækjum. Í sumum lestum sem fara yfir landamæri fer eftirlit fram þegar lestin er á ferð og þú verður að hafa meðferðis gild skilríki ef þú ferðast í slíkum lestum. Í næturlestum geta lestarverðir safnað saman vegabréfum svo að svefn þinn verði ekki fyrir truflun.
mt: Customs is usually the first inspection when disembarking from a plane, ship or other conveyance. In some countries, customs is conducted when you are on your way and you must have a valid passport if you travel in such countries. In night trains, the conductors may collect visas so that your sleep is not disturbed.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: "Singapúr er almennt séð örugg borg og auðvelt er að ferðast um hana. Þú getur keypt næstum hvað sem hugurinn girnist við komuna. En vegna staðsetningarinnar í ""hitabeltinu"", aðeins nokkrar gráður fyrir norðan miðbaug, þarf maður að takast á við hitann (stöðugt) og sterka sólina (þegar það er heiðskírt, sem er sjaldnar)."
mt: "Singapore is generally a safe city and easy to get around. You can buy almost anything you want at the airport. But because of its location in the "tropics", only a few degrees north of the equator, you have to take the heat (constant) and strong sun (when it's hot, which is rare)."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Þýskt sætabrauð er nokkuð gott og í Bæjaralandi. Það er ríkulegt og margbreytilegt, ekki ósvipað og hjá nágrönnunum í suðri, Austurríki. Ávaxtabökur eru algengar og epli eru bökuð allt árið um kring. Kirsuber og plómur bætast svo við yfir sumartímann. Mikið af þýsku bakkelsi inniheldur einnig möndlur, heslihnetur og aðrar trjáhnetur. Vinsælar kökur fara oft vel saman við bolla af sterku kaffi. Ef þig langar að prófa smágert en bragðgott bakkelsi skaltu prófa bakkelsið sem kallast á heimamáli Berliner, Pfannkuchen eða Krapfen.
mt: German chocolate is very good and in Bavaria. It is rich and varied, not unlike its neighbors in the south, Austria. Apple pies are common and apples are picked all year round. Cherries and plums are added over the summer. Many German cakes also contain raisins, currants and other dried fruits. Popular cakes often go well with strong coffee. If you want to try a small but tasty cake, you should try the cake called in the local language Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Ef þig langar að skoða allan heiminn á ódýran hátt eru nokkrar leiðir til þess í boði, hvort sem slíkt er af nauðsyn, lífsstílsákvörðun eða áskorun. Í raun er um tvær leiðir að ræða: Annaðhvort vinnur maður á meðan maður ferðast eða reynir að draga úr útgjöldum. Þessi grein fjallar mestmegnis um seinni kostinn. Fyrir þá sem eru til í að fórna þægindum, tíma og fyrirsjáanleika til að minnka útgjöld niður í næstum núll er vert að skoða ódýrar leiðir til að ferðast. Ráðgjöfin gefur sér að ferðamenn steli ekki, fari ekki inn í leyfisleysi, taki þátt í ólöglegum markaði, betli eða notfæri sér annað fólk.
mt: If you want to see the world on a budget, there are several ways to do it, whether it is a necessity, a lifestyle choice, or a challenge. In reality, there are two ways to go about it: either work while you travel or try to reduce your expenses to almost nothing. This article focuses mostly on the latter. For those who are able to sacrifice their comforts, time, and future earnings to reduce their expenses to next to nothing, it is worth considering cheap ways to travel. The advice does not recommend stealing, going into debt, engaging in illegal markets, gambling, or using other people.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Veghlutinn á milli Point Marion og Fairmont er með verstu akstursaðstæðurnar á Buffalo-Pittsburgh þjóðveginum og liggur oft um afskekkt strjálbýli. Ef þú ert ekki vön/vanur að keyra eftir sveitavegum skaltu gæta þín: Slíkir vegir einkennast af bröttum brekkum, þröngum stígum og kröppum beygjum. Hraðatakmarkanir sem birtar eru eru áberandi lægri en á fyrri og síðari köflum - venjulega 56-64 km/klst. - og ströng hlýðni við þá er jafnvel mikilvægari en ella. Þó er áhugavert að farsímaþjónusta sé umtalsvert sterkari hér en á öðrum löngum köflum leiðarinnar, t.d. Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont has the worst road conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Thruway and often passes through remote rural areas. If you are not used to driving on dirt roads, you should be careful: Such roads are characterized by steep slopes, narrow lanes and sharp turns. Speed limits posted are significantly lower than on previous and subsequent segments - usually 35-40 mph - and compliance with them is even more important than on other long segments of the route, such as Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Gljúfraferð snýst um að fara niður í botninn á gljúfri sem er annaðhvort þurrt eða fullt af vatni. Gljúfraferð sameinar sundiðkun, klifur og dýfingar -- en krefst lítillar þjálfunar eða líkamlegs atgervis til að koma sér af stað (í samanburði við klettaklifur, köfun eða skíðaiðkun sem dæmi).
mt: A glacial walk is a descent into a glacier that is either dry or full of water. Glacial walks combine swimming, climbing and diving -- but requires little training or physical fitness to get started (in comparison to rock climbing, surfing or skiing as examples).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: "Einfaldleikinn við að setjast inn í bíl og halda af stað í langa bílferð hefur visst aðdráttarafl. Þú þekkir líklega til við að aka bílnum þínum og þekkir takmörk hans, en það sam á ekki við um stærri ökutæki. Það getur auðveldlega vakið óæskilega athygli ef tjald er reist á einkalóð eða í bæ af hvaða stærð sem er. Í stuttu máli er frábært að  nota bíl til að fara í ferðalag en sjaldnast sem „gististað"" í útilegu. Bílaútilega er möguleg ef þú ert með stóran fjölnotabíl, jeppa, sedan-bíl eða skutbíl með sætum sem hægt er að leggja niður."
mt: "The simplicity of getting into a car and driving off on a long car trip has certainly had its allure. You probably know how to operate your car and are familiar with its limitations, but that does not apply to larger vehicles. It can easily attract unwanted attention if a tent is set up on private land or in a town of any size. In short, it is great to use a car to go on a trip but rarely as a "campsite" in the wilderness. Car camping is possible if you have a large SUV, jeep, sedan or pickup truck with seats that can be folded down."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: "Einfaldleikinn við að setjast inn í bíl og halda af stað í langa bílferð hefur visst aðdráttarafl. Þú þekkir líklega til við að aka bílnum þínum og þekkir takmörk hans, en það sam á ekki við um stærri ökutæki. Það getur auðveldlega vakið óæskilega athygli ef tjald er reist á einkalóð eða í bæ af hvaða stærð sem er. Í stuttu máli er frábært að  nota bíl til að fara í ferðalag en sjaldnast sem „gististað"" í útilegu. Bílaútilega er möguleg ef þú ert með stóran fjölnotabíl, jeppa, sedan-bíl eða skutbíl með sætum sem hægt er að leggja niður."
mt: "The simplicity of getting into a car and driving off on a long car trip has certainly had its allure. You probably know how to operate your car and are familiar with its limitations, but that does not apply to larger vehicles. It can easily attract unwanted attention if a tent is set up on private land or in a town of any size. In short, it is great to use a car to go on a trip but rarely as a "campsite" in the wilderness. Car camping is possible if you have a large SUV, jeep, sedan or pickup truck with seats that can be folded down."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Nútímaborgin Casablanca var stofnuð af Berber-sjómönnum á 10. öld f. Kr. Hún var notuð af Föníkumönnum, Rómverjum og Mereníðum sem hernaðarlega mikilvæg höfn, kölluð Anfa. Portúgalar rústuðu því og endurreistu undir nafninu Casa Branca, aðeins síðan til að yfirgefa það eftir jarðskjálfta árið 1755. Marokkóski sóldáninn endurbyggði borgina sem Daru l-Badya og hún fékk nafnið Casablanca af spænskum kaupmönnum sem stofnuðu þar verslunarstöðvar. Casablanca er einn minnst áhugaverðasti staðurinn til að versla í Marokkó. Í gömlu Medina er auðvelt að finna staði sem selja hefðbundinn marokkóskan varning á borð við tagine-potta, leirmuni, leðurvörur, vatnspípur og skart, en allt er þetta gert fyrir ferðamenn.
mt: Casablanca was founded by Berber sailors in the 10th century BC. It was used by Phoenicians, Romans and Merinids as a strategically important port, called Anfa. The Portuguese razed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after the earthquake of 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish merchants who established trading posts there. Casablanca is the least interesting place to shop in Morocco. In the old Medina it is easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan wares such as tagine pots, leather goods, spices, water pipes and jewelry, all of this for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Þar fyrir norðan og skammt undan er hinn rómantíski og heillandi bær Sintra sem Byron lávarður gerði frægan með leiftrandi frásögn sinni af fegurð bæjarins. Scotturb strætó 403 gengur reglulega til Sintra og stoppar við Cabo da Roca. Í norðurhlutanum er einnig þess virði að heimsækja helgidóm Maríu guðsmóður (helgiskrín), en þar hefur Maríu guðsmóður oft brugðið fyrir, eins og heimsþekkt er.
mt: To the north and a short distance away is the romantic and picturesque town of Sintra, which Byron made famous with his lyrical description of the beauty of the town. The Scotturb bus line 403 goes regularly to Sintra and stops at Cabo da Roca. In the north is also worth visiting the shrine of Our Lady of Fatima (shrine), where Our Lady of Fatima has often intervened, as is well known.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: Árið 1994 fóru Armenar Nagorno-Karabakh héraðsins í Aserbaísjan í stríð við Aserbaísjana. Með stuðningi Armeníu var stofnað nýtt lýðveldi. En ekkert staðfest ríki, ekki einu sinni Armenía, viðurkenna það opinberlega. Diplómatískur ágreiningur um svæðið heldur áfram að spilla fyrir samskiptum Armeníu og Aserbaídsjan.
mt: 1994, Armenians of the Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan went to war with Azerbaijan. With the support of Armenia, a new republic was founded. However, no state, not even Armenia, has ever officially recognized it. Diplomatic disagreement over the area continues to hinder relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Einn af öflugu punktum Charlotte í Norður-Karólínu er að þar er nóg af vönduðum valkostum fyrir fjölskyldur. Fólk sem kemur öðrum svæðum nefnr fjölskylduvænt oft sem helstu ástæðuna fyrir flutningi þangað og gestum finnst borgin oft vera þægileg hvað börn varðar. Á síðustu 20 árum hefur úrval barnvænna valkosta aukist til muna í miðbæ Charlotte. Leigubílar eru almennt ekki notaðir af fjölskyldum í Charlotte, þó að þeir geti komið að gagni við ákveðnar kringumstæður. Ekki þarf að greiða aukalega fyrir að vera með fleiri en 2 farþega. Því gæti þessi valkostur verið dýrari en nauðsyn krefur.
mt: One of the main draws of Charlotte, North Carolina, is the abundance of family-friendly options. People who move to the area from other parts of the country often cite family-friendly as the main reason for the move, and the city is often found to be a good place for children. In the last 20 years, the selection of family-friendly options has increased exponentially in downtown Charlotte. Rented cars are not commonly used by families in Charlotte, though they could be helpful in certain circumstances. There is no extra charge for having more than 2 passengers. This option may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Fyrir komu Spánverja á 16. öld réðu Inkar ríkjum í norðurhluta Chile og Araucanian-indíánar bjuggu í mið- og suðurhluta Chile. Mapuche var einnig einn af síðustu sjálfstæðu amerísku frumbyggjahópunum sem var ekki að fullu settur undir spænskumælandi stjórn fyrr en eftir sjálfstæði Chile. Síle lýsti yfir sjálfstæði árið 1810 (í miðjum Napóleónsstríðunum þegar engin ríkisstjórn var á Spáni) en lokasigurinn á móti Spánverjunum vannst ekki fyrr en árið 1818.
mt: 16th century Spanish conquistadors ruled the north of Chile, while the Mapuche lived in the middle and south of Chile. The Mapuche was also one of the last independent Amerindian nations to be fully subjugated by Spanish-speaking rule, not until after the independence of Chile in 1810 (in the middle of the Napoleonic Wars when no government was in Spain) was the final victory against the Spanish won in 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, sem þýðir fimm landsvæði, samanstendur af fimm litlum hafnarbæjum: Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza og Monterosso, sem eru á ítalska svæðinu Liguria. Þær eru skráðar á heimsminjaskrá UNESCO. Í aldanna rás hafa menn byggt með vönduðum hætti verandir á rosalegu og bröttu landsvæði rétt við klettana sem eru með útsýni yfir hafið. Hluti af þokka þess er skortur á sýnilegri þróun fyrirtækja. Stígar, lestir og bátar tengja þorpin saman og ekki er hægt að aka bílum til þeirra utan frá.
mt: Cinque Terre, which means five lands, consists of five small harbors: Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, which are located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have built terraces with great care on the beautiful and rugged land near the cliffs, which offer views of the sea. Part of the charm of the area is the lack of visible business development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages and it is not possible to drive cars to them except from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Slys verða oftast á veturna vegna vega, gangstétta og stiga sem eru hálir. Maður þarf að minnsta kosti skófatnað með hentugum sóla. Sumarskór eru venjulega sleipir á ís og snjó, jafnvel sumir kuldaskór duga ekki til. Mynstrið ætti að vera nógu djúpt, 5 mm (1/5 tommur) eða dýpra, og efnið nógu mjúkt í kulda. Sum stígvél eru með nagla og í boði er negldur viðbótarbúnaður fyrir hálar aðstæður, hentugur fyrir flesta skó og stígvél, fyrir hælana eða hælana og sóla. Hælar eiga að vera lágir og breiðir. Sandi, möl eða salti (kalsíumklóríð) er oft dreift á vegi og slóða til að auka grip.
mt: 80% of accidents happen in the winter due to ice, snow and steps that are slippery. You should at least wear proper shoes with good soles. Summer shoes are usually slippery on ice and snow, and some winter boots are not suitable. The tread should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or deeper, and the material should be soft in cold. Some staircases have nails and there is a nail kit available for high altitude conditions, suitable for most shoes and staircases, for the heels or heels and soles. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, mud or salt (calcium chloride) is often spread on the road and sidewalks to increase grip.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: "Cooks-eyjar er eyjaríki í frjálsu sambandi við Nýja-Sjáland, staðsett í Pólýnesíu, í miðju Suður-Kyrrahafi. Þetta er eyjaklasi sem telur um 15 eyjar um víð og dreif á hafsvæði sem er um 2,2 milljón ferkílómetrar að stærð. Þar sem eyjurnar eru á sama tímabelti og Hawaii, eru þær oft sagðar ""Hawaii hinum megin á hnettingum"". Þó hún sé minni, minnir hún suma eldri gesti á Hawaii áður en það varð eitt ríkjanna, án allra stóru ferðamannahótelanna og annarrar uppbyggingar. Á Cooks-eyjum eru engar borgir en þær samanstanda af 15 eyjum. Stærstu eyjarnar eru Rarotonga og Aitutaki."
mt: "The Cook Islands is a self-governing territory in free association with New Zealand, located in the Pacific Ocean in between New Zealand and Hawaii. It is a collection of 15 islands covering a land area of 2,172 square kilometres (837 sq mi). Because the islands are on the same time zone as Hawaii, they are often referred to as "Hawaii beyond the horizon". Although smaller, they resemble the older guests on Hawaii before it became one of the states, without the large hotels and other developments. The Cook Islands are not a country but a collection of 15 islands. The largest islands are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

Although smaller, they resemble the older guests on Hawaii before it became one of the states, without the large hotels and other developments. The Cook Islands are not a country but a collection of 15 islands. The largest islands are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Leyfi þarf að panta fyrirfram. Þú verður að hafa leyfi til að gista í Sirena. Sirena er eina landvarðarstöðin sem býður upp á gistingu í svefnsal og heitar máltíðir og tjaldsvæðis. La Leona, San Pedrillo og Los Patos eru aðeins með tjaldstæði án matarþjónustu. Hægt er að fá aðgangsleyfi að garðinum hjá þjóðgarðsvörðunum í Puerto Jimenez, en þar er ekki tekið við kreditkortum Park Service (MINAE) gefur ekki út almenningsgarðleyfi meira en einum mánuði fyrir þann komutíma sem er áætlaður. CafeNet El Sol býður upp á bókunarþjónustu fyrir gjald upp á 30 Bandaríkjadali, eða 10 Bandaríkjadali fyrir dagspassa; finna má upplýsingar á Corcovado-síðunni þeirra.
mt: You must reserve in advance. You must have permission to camp at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers camping with a tent and hot meals and a campsite. La Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos only have campsite without food service. You can get access to the park at Puerto Jimenez, but they do not accept credit cards. Park Service (MINAE) does not issue public park permits more than one month for the arrival date that is estimated. CafeNet El Sol offers booking service for a fee of 30 US dollars, or 10 US dollars for day passes; you can find information on their Corcovado website.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Fjallganga á skíðum: Þetta kallast líka skíðaganga í óbyggðum, skíðaferðalag eða bara skíðaganga. Þetta er skyld skíðaíþrótt en felur yfirleitt ekki í sér alpagreinar né fjallaklifur, en síðarnefndu íþróttagreinarnar fara fram í miklum bratta og krefjast notkunar á mun stífari skíðum og skíðaskóm. Líttu á skíðaleiðina álíka og gönguleið. Þegar skilyrði eru góð getur þú komist nokkuð lengri vegalengd heldur en ef þú værir gangandi. Hins vegar nærðu mjög sjaldan sama hraða og á gönguskíðum án þess að vera með þungan bakpoka í skíðarásum.
mt: Mountain skiing: This is also called backcountry skiing, ski touring or just ski touring. This is a subdiscipline of skiing but does not usually involve alpine or mountaineering, which are more demanding and require stiffer skis and ski boots. Little like ski trails. When conditions are good you can go much further than if you were walking. However, you rarely achieve the same speed as on ski touring without the heavy backpack in ski boots.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Endurkomuáfall kemur upp fyrr en menningaráfall (brúðkaupsdagarnir eru styttri), það varir lengur og getur verið alvarlegra. Ferðamann sem áttu auðvelt með að laga sig að nýju menningunni eiga stundum sérlega erfitt með að laga sig aftur að eigin menningu. Þegar snúið er heim eftir búsetu erlendis, hefur maður aðlagast nýrri menningu og glatað niður sumum fyrri venjum. Þegar farið er til útlanda í fyrsta sinn er fólk líklega þolinmótt og skilningsríkt, vitandi að ferðamenn í nýju landi þurfa að aðlagast. Fólk kann ekki að sjá að þolinmæði og skilningur sé einnig nauðsynlegur fyrir ferðamenn þegar þeir snúa aftur heim.
mt: Reentry is easier than emigration, it lasts longer and can be more serious. People who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture may have a hard time adjusting back to their own. When returning home after living abroad, one has adapted to the new culture and forgotten some of the old customs. When going abroad for the first time, people are likely to be tolerant and knowledgeable, knowing that travelers in a new land need to adapt. People cannot see that tolerance and understanding is also necessary for travelers when they return home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Elgir eru í eðlislægt ekki árásargjarnir. Þeir verja sig samt ef þeir skynja ógnun. Þeir sem telja elginn ekki hættulegan, kunna að fara of nálægt og stofna sér í hættu.
mt: Deer are not naturally aggressive. They will defend themselves if they sense danger. Those who think deer are harmless can get too close and provoke them.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Elgir eru í eðlislægt ekki árásargjarnir. Þeir verja sig samt ef þeir skynja ógnun. Þeir sem telja elginn ekki hættulegan, kunna að fara of nálægt og stofna sér í hættu.

src: Í hita dagsins kunna ferðalangar að sjá hillingar sem virðast vera vatn (eða aðrir hlutir). Þetta getur reynst hættulegt ef ferðalangurinn eltist við hillinguna og eyðir þannig þeirri orku og vatni sem hann á eftir. Heitustu eyðimerkur geta jafnvel orðið nístingskaldar að næturlagi. Ofkæling er raunveruleg ef hlýjar flíkur eru ekki fyrir hendi.
mt: In the heat of the day, travelers may see mirages that appear to be water (or other objects). This can be dangerous if the traveler chases the mirage and thus wastes the energy and water he is after. The hottest mirages can even become frosty at night. Cooling is real if humid breezes are not present.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
