src: "Óumboðnar veggmyndir og krafs er kallað graff. Þó það sér alls ekki nútímafyrirbæri, tengja flestir veggjakrot með úðabrúsum líklega við skemmdarverk unglinga á eignum hins opinbera og einkaaðila. Í dag eru  hins vegar til frægir veggjakrotslistamenn, veggjakrotsviðburðir eru haldnir og til eru veggir sem „löglegt"" er að krota á. Þessi gerð veggjakrots líkist oft listaverkum frekar en ólæsilegum merkingum."
mt: "Uninvited murals and graffiti are called grafitti. Although it is not a modern phenomenon, most people associate graffiti with vandalism likely committed by young people on the property of the public and private entities. However, today there are famous graffiti artists, graffiti events are held and there are walls that are "legally" to be graffitied. This type of graffiti often resembles works of art rather than illegible markings."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Á sumum hátíðum ákveður meirihluti gesta sem sækja tónlistarhátíðir heim að tjalda á staðnum og flestir gestanna líta á það sem nauðsynlegan þátt upplifunarinnar. Ef þú vilt vera nálægt fjörinu verður þú að mæta snemma til að fá tjaldstæði nálægt tónlistinni. Mundu að jafnvel þó að tónlistin á aðalsviðunum sé lokið kann tónlist að vera leikin á svæðum hátíðarinnar langt fram á nótt. Sumar hátíðir eru með sérstök tjaldsvæði fyrir fjölskyldur með ung börn.
mt: At some festivals, the majority of guests who attend music festivals choose to camp on site and most guests consider it essential to the experience. If you want to be close to the music, you will need to arrive early to get a campsite near the music. Even if the main stages are finished, music may be played in festival areas late into the night. Some festivals have separate camping areas for families with young children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Þar sem mörg þorpanna eru úr alfaraleið, verður ekki hægt að finna næturlíf að neinu ráði án þess að fara til Albuquerque eða Santa Fe. Flest af spilavítunum sem talin eru upp hér á undan bjóða hins vegar upp á drykki og heimsfrægir skemmtikraftar troða upp í nokkrum þeirra (aðallega í stærstu spilavítunum sem eru í nágrenni Albuquerque og Santa Fe). Varúð: Litlar þorpskrár eru ekki alltaf góðir staðir fyrir gesti til að hanga á hér. Í fyrsta lagi er ölvunarakstur töluvert vandamál í norðurhluta Nýju-Mexíkó og fjöldi ökumanna undir áhrifum er mikill í grennd við bari í litlum bæjum.
mt: As most of the towns listed here are in the high desert, it is not possible to find any nightlife without going to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, most of the bars listed here offer drinks and famous entertainers play in some of them (mostly in the larger bars near Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Warning: Small town bars are not always good places for visitors to hang out here. First of all, drunk driving is a major problem in northern New Mexico and a large number of DUIs are common in small towns near the border.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: "Vinsælasti bjórinn á staðnum er „Number One“, það er ekki flókinn bjór en góður og hressandi. Hinn bjórinn frá staðnum heitir ""Manta"". Hægt er að kaupa mörg frönsk vín en vín frá Nýja-Sjálandi og Ástralíu gætu þolað ferðalagið betur. Alveg er öruggt að drekka kranavatnið á staðnum en auðvelt er að nálgast vatn á flöskum ef þú óttast kranavatnið. Fyrir Ástrala er hugmyndin um „flat white“ kaffi framandi. „Short black“ er espressó, cappuccino kemur með haug af rjóma (ekki froðu) og te er borið fram án mjólkur. Heita súkkulaðið er í samræmi við belgíska staðla. Ávaxtasafar eru dýrir en mjög góðir."
mt: "The most popular beer on the island is "Number One", it is not a complicated beer but good and refreshing. The beer from the island is called "Manta". Many French wines can be purchased but wines from New Zealand and Australia could have endured the journey better. It is very likely that the tap water on the island is safe to drink but it is easy to get bottled water if you are afraid of the tap water. The idea of a "flat white" coffee is foreign to Australians. "Short black" is espresso, cappuccino comes with a mound of froth (not foam) and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is in accordance with Belgian standards. The fruit salads are expensive but very good."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "Guaraní var stærsti frumbyggjahópurinn sem bjó á því landsvæði sem er nú Austur-Paragvæ. Þau bjuggu sem hálfgerðir hirðingjaveiðimenn sem stunduðu einnig sjálfsþurftarbúskap. Á Chaco-svæðinu voru heimkynni annarra hópa frumbyggja, svo sem Guaycuru og Payagua, sem drógu viðurværi sitt af veiðum og söfnun. Á 16. öld var Paragvæ, eða ""Stóra Indíahéraðið"", stofnað þegar spænsku landnemarnir hittu fyrir hópa innfæddra. Spánverjar hófu nýlendutímann sem stóð í þrjár aldir. Paragvæ hefur tekist að halda í mikið af frumbyggjaeðli sínu og sjálfsmynd frá stofnun Asunción árið 1537."
mt: "Guaraní was the largest indigenous group that lived on the land that is now Eastern Paraguay. They lived as semi-nomadic herders who also practiced subsistence agriculture. On the Chaco land were the homes of other indigenous groups, such as Guaycuru and Payagua, who drew their livelihood from hunting and gathering. In the 16th century, Paraguay, or the "Great Indian Country", was founded when Spanish settlers encountered indigenous groups. The Spanish began a colonial period that lasted for three centuries. Paraguay has managed to maintain much of its indigenous character and identity from the founding of Asunción in 1537."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "Parísarbúar verið þekktir þekktir fyrir að vera sjálfhverfir, dónalegir og hrokafullir. Þó þetta sé oft aðeins ónákvæm staðalímynd, er besta leiðin til að njóta dvalarinnar í París að sýna spariskapið og hegða sér eins og maður sé ""bien élevé"" (vel upp alinn). Það auðveldar manni lífið verulega. Kaldrænt viðmót Parísarbúa hverfur skjótt ef þú sýnir fram á almenna kurteisi."
mt: "Parisians are known for being self-absorbed, arrogant and rude. While this may be only a stereotype, the best way to enjoy your stay in Paris is to show politeness and behave as if you were ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make your life much easier. The coldness of Parisians disappears quickly if you show common courtesy."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRail býður upp á tvennskonar miðaflokka fyrir svæðislestir í Höfðaborg og úthverfum: MetroPlus (kallast einnig First Class) og Metro (kallast Third Class). MetroPlus er þægilegri og ekki eins mannmargur en örlítið dýrari. Samt ódýrari en hefðbundnir miðar í neðanjarðarlestir Evrópu. Allar lestir eru bæði með MetroPlus- og Metro-farrými; MetroPlus-farrýmin eru alltaf í enda lestarinnar næst Höfðaborg.
mt: MetroRail offers two classes of service for suburban and outlying areas: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (also called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and not as crowded but slightly more expensive. Also cheaper than traditional European subway cars. All trains have both MetroPlus and Metro compartments; MetroPlus compartments are always at the end of the train nearest the city.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Ferðamenn kunna að standa frammi fyrir dýrafarsóttum sem þeir ekki þekkja til á heimaslóðum. Meindýr geta spillt mat, valdið ertingu eða í verstu tilvikum valdið ofnæmisviðbrögðum, dreift eitri eða smitað. Smitsjúkdómar, eða hættuleg dýr sem geta valdið fólki skaða eða dregið það til dauða, flokkast yfirleitt ekki undir plágur.
mt: Travelers can unknowingly encounter zoonotic diseases on their home turf. Animals can contaminate food, spread disease or, in the worst case, trigger allergic reactions, spread toxins or infect. Diseases, or dangerous animals that can harm or kill people, are not usually classified as plagues.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Hver einasti söluturn býður upp á  frumskóg af fyrirframgreiddum símakortum sem hægt er að nota í símasjálfsölum eða venjulegum símum. Flest kort má nota til að hringja hvert sem er, en sum bjóða sérstaklega upp á hagstætt verð á stímtölum til ákveðinna hópa landa. Oft fæst aðgangur að slíkri þjónustu í gegnum tollfrjálst símanúmer sem hringt er í endurgjaldslaust úr flestum símum.
mt: Each individual sale offers a pre-paid forest of calling cards that can be used in pay phones or regular phones. Most cards can be used to call anywhere, but some offer special rates to certain groups of countries. Often access to such service is through a toll-free number that can be dialed free from most phones.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Vatnaþjóðgarðurinn í Plitvice er mjög mikið skógi vaxinn, þar er einkum að finna beyki, greni og furu og blöndu af Alpa- og Miðjarðarhafsgróðri. Þar er gríðarlega mikið úrval af plöntum vegna fjölbreytileika í nærviðri, ólíkum jarðvegi og breytilegri hæð yfir sjávarmáli. Svæðið er einnig heimkynni fjölbreyttra dýra- og fuglategunda. Finna má þar mjög sjaldséð dýralíf eins og evrópska brúnbjörninn, úlfa, erni, uglur, lax, villiketti og þiði ásamt mörgum algengari tegundum
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is heavily forested, with predominantly beech, fir and spruce, and a mix of Alpine and Mediterranean flora. The area is rich in plant species due to the diversity of the climate, soil and altitude. The park is also home to a variety of animal and bird species. One can find rare animals such as the brown bear, wolf, lynx, eagle, otter, salmon, wildcat and chamois, as well as many more common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "Fjölmiðlafyrirtækin ljúga reglulega um tilgang þessa og halda því fram þetta sé gert til að ""koma í veg fyrir sjórán"". Í rauninni hafa svæðiskóðar alls engin áhrif á ólöglegar afritanir, hægt er að spila efni sem er afritað bita fyrir bita á diski í nánast öllum tækjum sem spila upprunalega efnið. Raunverulegi tilgangurinn er að veita þessum fyrirtækjum meiri stjórn á mörkuðum sínum. Allt snýst þetta um að græða meira."
mt: "Media companies lie regularly about the purpose of this and claim that it is done to ""prevent piracy"". In reality, region codes have no effect on illegal copies, it is possible to play back ripped content bit by bit on a disk in almost all devices that play the original content. The real purpose is to give these companies more control over their markets. It's all about making more money."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Þó útlendingaeftirlit sé yfirleitt ekkert eða formsatriði þegar komið er til heimalands síns, getur tollvarslan verið erfið. Gakktu úr skugga um að þú vitir hvað þú mátt koma með og teldu fram allt sem er yfir löglegum mörkum.
mt: Customs is usually not an issue or a formality when returning to your home country, but the inspection can be difficult. Be sure to know what you can bring in and count all items over the legal limit.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Cochamó-dalur - Helsti klifurstaður Síle, þekktur sem Yosemite Suður-Ameríku, með úrval stórra granítveggja og kletta. Fjallstindar eru með stórkostlegt útsýni. Fjallgöngumenn frá öllum heimshornum eru stöðugt að koma á fót nýjum leiðum á meðal endalausra veggja hans.
mt: Cochamó Valley - The best climbing destination in Chile, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a selection of large granite walls and cliffs. Mountain peaks are with spectacular views. Mountain climbers from all over the world are constantly coming up with new routes among the endless walls of it.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Ef þú vilt fljúga hringinn í kringum hnöttinn á suðurhveli jarðar er takmarkað framboð á flugferðum og áfangastöðum vegna skorts á flugleiðum yfir hafið. Ekkert bandalag flugfélaga nær yfir þau þrjú flug yfir höf á suðurhveli jarðar (og SkyTeam flýgur ekki neitt af þeim). Star Alliance býður upp á flugferðir um allt svæðið fyrir utan Suður-Kyrrahaf frá Santíagó í Síle til Tahítí, en slíkar flugferðir eru á vegum LATAM Oneworld. Þetta flug er ekki eini valkosturinn ef þú vilt sleppa Suður-Kyrrahafi og vesturströnd Suður-Ameríku. (sjá hér að neðan)
mt: If you want to fly around the world on the southern hemisphere, there is limited availability of flights and destinations due to lack of overwater routes. No airline alliance covers all three overwater routes on the southern hemisphere (and SkyTeam flies none of them). Star Alliance offers flights around the entire region except for the Southern Pacific from Santiago in Chile to Tahiti, but these flights are operated by LATAM Oneworld. This is not the only option if you want to avoid the Southern Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Í heiminum eru næstum 200 fyrirtæki sem skipuleggja hlaupaferðir. Flest þeirra eru sjálfstætt starfandi. Fyrirtækið Go Running Tours, sem tók við af Global Running Tours myndar tengsl við tugir fyrirtækja sem bjóða upp á hlaup og skoðunarferðir saman á fjórum heimsálfum. Upprunalega sprottið af fyrirtækinu Running Tours Barcelona og Running Copenhagen, Running Tours Prague með aðsetur í Prag, bættist fljótlega við hópinn ásamt öðrum.
mt: There are nearly 200 companies that organize running tours. Most of them are independent. Go Running Tours, which took over from Global Running Tours, has connections with dozens of companies that offer running and sightseeing tours on four continents. The original sprouted from Running Tours Barcelona and Running Copenhagen, Running Tours Prague with headquarters in Prague, soon joined the group along with others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "Safarí er hugsanlega aðalaðdráttaraflið fyrir ferðamenn í Afríku og hápunktur ferðarinnar hjá mörgum gestum. Hugtakið safarí er almennt notað til að vísa til ferðalaga um land til að skoða töfrandi afrískt dýralíf, einkum á grassléttunni. Sum dýr, til dæmis fílar og gíraffar, hafa tilhneigingu til að nálgast bíla og staðalbúnaður auðveldar það að skoða þau vel. Ljón, blettatígrar og hlébarðar eru stundum feimnir og maður sér þá betur með sjónaukum. Gangandi safaríferð (líka kallað ""skógarferð"", ""göngusafarí"" eða að fara ""fótgangandi"") felur í sér göngu sem tekur ýmist nokkra klukkutíma eða nokkra daga."
mt: "Safari is likely the main attraction for tourists in Africa and the highlight of the trip for many guests. The term safari is generally used to refer to a trip by tourists or visitors to Africa to view its wildlife, especially large mammals. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, have a tendency to approach vehicles and stationary equipment, making them easy to observe. Lions, tigers, and bears are sometimes elusive and one sees them better with binoculars. Walking safari (also called "forest walk", "hiking safari" or to go "on foot") involves walking for either a few hours or a few days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Ferðir eru ódýrari fyrir stærri hópa og því er betra fyrir þá sem ferðast einir eða tveir saman að hafa uppi á fleirum til að mynda fjögurra til sex manna hóp til að fá betra verð á mann. Hins vegar þarftu ekki að hafa áhyggjur af þessu því ferðamenn eru iðulega færðir til svo hægt sé að fylla bílana. Þetta virðist í raun vera aðferð til að plata fólk til að trúa að það þurfi að borga meira.
mt: Tours are cheaper for larger groups and thus it is better for them to have up to four or six people to form a group to get a better price per person. However, you do not need to worry about this as tourists are usually moved to so that it is possible to fill the cars. This seems to be a way to trick people into believing that they need to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Þó efnahagslíf San Francisco tengist því að borgin er vinsæll ferðamannastaður, er efnahagslífið fjölbreytt. Stærstu atvinnugreinarnar eru sérfræðiþjónusta, stjórnsýsla, fjármál, viðskipti og ferðaþjónusta. Endurtekin birting hennar í tónlist, kvikmyndum, bókmenntum og alþýðumenningu hefur gert borgina og kennimerki hennar víðfræg um allan heim. San Francisco hefur byggt upp mikla innviði fyrir ferðamenn með fjölmörgum hótelum, veitingastöðum og ráðstefnuaðstöðu í fremstu röð. San Francisco er einnig einn besti staður í landinu fyrir aðra asíska matargerð: Kóreska, taílenska, indverska og japanska.
mt: San Francisco's economy is primarily based on tourism, and is a popular destination for both business and leisure travelers. The city's central location and proximity to the Bay Area make it a popular destination for international visitors. San Francisco is also a popular tourist destination for domestic visitors. The city is known for its cool summers, fog, steep rolling hills, eclectic mix of architecture, and landmarks such as the Golden Gate Bridge, cable cars, and Coit Tower. San Francisco is also known for its steep streets, which are a major source of traffic congestion. The city is also known for its diverse population, which includes a large number of immigrants from Asia and Latin America. San Francisco is also home to a number of major technology companies, including Google, Facebook, and Twitter. The city is also home to a number of major sports teams, including the San Francisco Giants and the San Francisco 49ers.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Með því að bóka í tíma getur ferðalangurinn slakað á vitandi það að hann hafi tryggt sér gististað þegar hann mætir á svæðið. Ferðaskrifskofur eru oft með samninga við tiltekinn hótel, þó einnig sé hægt að bóka annars skonar gistingu, eins og tjaldstæði, hjá ferðaskrifstofu. Ferðaskrifstofur bjóða yfirleitt pakkaferðir með morgunverði, flutningi til og frá flugvelli og jafnvel flug og hótel í sama pakka. Þeir geta einnig haldið bókuninni fyrir þig ef þú þarft tíma til að hugsa um tilboðið eða afla einhverra skjala fyrir áfangastað þinn (t.d. vegabréfsáritun). Hafið fyrst samband við ferðaskrifstofuna varðandi breytingar og aðrar beiðnir áður en leitað er til hótelsins.
mt: By booking in advance, a traveler can ensure that he or she has secured lodging when arriving at the destination. Travel agents often have contracts with a particular hotel, but it is also possible to book other types of accommodation, such as camping, with a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer package tours with breakfast, transportation to and from the airport, and even flights and hotels in the same package. They can also hold the booking for you if you need time to think about the offer or obtain some documents for your destination (e.g. visa application). First contact the travel agent regarding changes and other requests before seeking out the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Rauntíma textaþýðingarforrit - forrit sem geta sjálfkrafa þýtt heilan hluta texta úr einu tungumáli yfir á annað. Sum forritin í þessum flokki geta jafnvel þýtt texta á erlendum tungumálum á skiltum eða aðra hluti í raunheimum þegar notandinn vísar snjallsímanum í átt að þessum hlutum. Þýðingarvélarnar hafa orðið betri svo um munar og þýða nú oft nokkurn veginn rétt (og sjaldan er þrugl), en aðgát skal höfð, þar sem enn kann að vera að niðurstöðurnar séu rangar. Eitt þekktasta appið í flokkinum er Google Translate. Í því er hægt að þýða án þess að vera nettengdur þegar viðeigandi tungumálagög hafa verið sótt.
mt: Real-time text translation software - software that can automatically translate a whole portion of text from one language to another. Some of these programs can even translate text in foreign languages on signs or other real-world objects when the user points a smartphone at them. Translation programs have gotten better so that they often translate correctly (and rarely are wrong), but caution should be taken, as the results can still be inaccurate. The most well-known app in the category is Google Translate. In it, it is possible to translate without being connected when the appropriate language packs have been downloaded.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Snjóflóð geta átt sér stað. Brattar hlíðarnar geta aðeins haldið vissu magni af snjó og umframmagn fer af stað og skapar snjóflóðið. Vandamálið er að snjór er samloðandi og því þarf ákveðna fyrirhöfn til að koma honum af stað og þegar hann fer af stað getur það orðið kveikjan fyrir afganginn. Kveikjan er stundum í upphafi sólin að verma snjó, stundum er um meiri snjókoma að ræða, stundum aðra náttúrulega atburði, oft eru þeir af mannavöldum.
mt: Avalanche can occur. Steep slopes can only hold a certain amount of snow and when that amount is exceeded, an avalanche is triggered. The trigger is sometimes the beginning of the sun to melt snow, sometimes more snowfall is at stake, sometimes other natural events, often of human origin.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "Karrí er réttur að grunni til úr kryddjurtum og kryddum ásamt kjöti eða grænmeti. Karrí er annaðhvort ""þurrt"" eða ""blautt"", háð vökvamagninu. Í innsveitum Norður-Indlands og Pakistan er jógurt iðulega notuð í karrí en hins vegar er kókosmjólk yfirleitt notuð í Suður-Indlandi og öðrum héruðum við strandlengju undirálfunnar."

src: South Pole Traverse (eða Highway) er 1600 km leið frá McMurdo-stöðinni við Rosshaf á Pólinn. Hann er samanþjappaður snjór með snjófylltum jökulsprungum og er merktur með fánum. Einungis er hægt að ferðast um hann á sérútbúnum farartækjum sem draga á eftir sér sleða með eldsneyti og birgðum. Ekki er þetta mjög lipurt. Taka þarf því stóran sveig á stíginn í kringum Transantarctic-fjöllin svo hægt sé að fara á hásléttuna.
mt: 1600 km South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a route from McMurdo Station to Ross Ice Shelf at the South Pole. It is marked with a flag. Only specially equipped vehicles can travel on it, pulling sleds with fuel and supplies. This is not very popular. It takes a large detour around the Transantarctic Mountains to get to the high plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Að ferðast um Suður-Afríku á bíl er frábær leið til að berja fegurð landsins augum, ásamt því að komast á staði sem eru úr alfaraleið ferðamanna. Það er hægt að gera þetta í venjulegum bíl með nákvæmri skipulagningu en fjórhjóladrif er ráðlagt og margir staðir eru aðeins aðgengilegir með fjórhjóladrifi og upphækkun. Hafðu í huga við skipulagninguna að þó að Suður-Afríka sé stöðug eru ekki öll nágrannalöndin það. Kröfur um vegabréfsáritun og kostnaður er mismunandi á milli landi og ráðast af því frá hvaða landi þú kemur. Hvert land hefur auk þess sín eigin lög um hvaða neyðarbúnaður eigi að vera í bifreiðinni.
mt: To travel around South Africa by car is a great way to see the beauty of the country, as well as getting to places that are off the beaten path. This can be done in a regular car with careful planning, but a four-wheel drive is recommended and many places are only accessible with four-wheel drive and a lift. Keep in mind that while South Africa is stable, not all neighboring countries are. Requirements for car insurance and cost varies between countries and is determined by which country you are coming from. Each country also has its own laws regarding what emergency equipment should be in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Að bera fyrir aðra - Aldrei missa sjónar af farangrinum þínum, sérstaklega þegar farið er á milli landamæra. Það er hægt að lenda í því að vera notaður til að flytja eiturlyfj án þinnar vitundar, en slíkt getur bakað manni mikil vandræði. Þetta á líka við að bíða í röð. Notkun eiturlyfjahunda er nefnilega ekki möguleg án fyrirvara. Sum lönd eru með mjög grimmdarlegar refsingar, jafnvel við brot í fyrsta sinn. Slíkt getur falið í sér fangelsisdóma sem eru yfir 10 ár eða dauðadóm. Farangri sem skilinn er eftir er oft stolið og getur einnig dregið athygli yfirvalda sem hafa áhyggjur af sprengjuhótunum.
mt: 1. Don't let others carry your luggage, especially when crossing borders. It is possible to be used to transport drugs without your knowledge, but this can also lead to serious problems. This also applies to waiting in line. The use of narcotics is obviously not possible without prior notice. Some countries have very harsh penalties, even for the first time. This can result in prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Luggage that is left behind is often stolen and can also attract the attention of authorities who have concerns about the explosives.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Fylltu heimili þitt af ilmandi kaffi á morgnana og róandi kamillutei á kvöldin. Þegar farið er í heimafrí efst tími til að gera vel við sig og eyða smá tíma í að gera eitthvað sérstakt. Ef þig langar að prófa eitthvað nýtt skaltu nýta tækifærið og búa til eða blanda saman nokkrum þeytingum: kannski kemurðu upp með einfaldan drykk sem þú getur búið til í morgunverð þegar hversdagslega rútínan þín er aftur komin í gang. Ef þú býrð í borg þar sem er fjölbreytt drykkjarmenning skaltu prófa að fara á bari eða pöbba í hverfum sem þú heimsækir ekki oft.
mt: Fill your home with aromatic coffee in the mornings and relaxing chamomile tea in the evenings. When you have a day off, take the time to do something special. If you want to try something new, take the opportunity and create or mix up some new concoctions: maybe you'll come up with a simple drink that you can make for breakfast when your usual routine is back in action. If you live in a city with a diverse drinking culture, try going to a bar or pub in neighborhoods you don't often visit.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Þorpið Haldarsvík er með útsýni yfir eyjuna Eysturoy í nágrenninu og þar er að finna óvenjulega átthyrnda kirkju. Í kirkjugarðinum eru áhugaverðar höggmyndir úr marmara af dúfum á sumum leiðanna. Það er þess virði að taka sér hálftíma til að rölta um þetta athyglisverða þorp.
mt: The village of Haldarsvík has a view of the island of Eysturoy in the vicinity and there is an unusual church. In the churchyard are interesting carved marble of doves on some of the paths. It is worth taking half an hour to tour this interesting village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Þó ekki sé nauðsynlegt að fá vegabréfsáritun fyrir stuttar heimsóknir til ákveðinna landa sem ferðamaður eða í viðskiptaerindum, þurfa nemendur utanlands frá yfirleitt að dvelja lengur en tilfallandi ferðalangar. Ef þú ætlar að dvelja erlendis í lengri tíma þarftu almennt að fá vegabréfsáritun áður en þú leggur af stað. Námsmannaáritanir eru yfirleitt með aðrar kröfur og umsóknarferli en hefðbundnar vegabréfsáritanir fyrir ferðamenn eða fyrirtæki. Fyrir flest lönd er þörf á boðsbréfi frá stofnuninni sem þú vilt stunda nám við og sýna fram á nægt fjármagn svo að þú getir framfleytt þér a.m.k. fyrsta námsárið. Leitaðu til stofnunarinnar auk útlendingaeftirlitsins í landinu þar sem þú vilt stunda nám til að verða þér úti um nákvæmar kröfur.
mt: While it is not necessary to obtain a visa for short visits to certain countries, students from outside the U.S. will usually need to stay longer than the duration of their trip. If you plan to stay abroad for a longer period of time, you will usually need to obtain a visa before you leave. Student visas are usually different in requirements and application processes than standard visas for tourists or businesses. For most countries, you will need a letter of invitation from the institution you will be studying at and proof of sufficient funds to cover at least your first year of study. Check with the institution as well as the country's immigration office to find out the exact requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Á sumrin verður þú sérstaklega að gæta þín á moskítóflugum ef þú ætlar að ferðast í gegnum frumskóginn. Jafnvel þótt keyrt sé í gegnum regnskóga á heittempruðum svæðum, þá komast moskítóflugur inn í ökutækið bara við það að opna dyrnar í nokkrar sekúndur til að setjast inn.
mt: You will be especially vigilant for mosquitoes if you plan to travel through the rainforest this summer. Even if you drive through a rainforest in a hot temperate area, mosquito flies can get into the vehicle just by opening the doors for a few seconds to get in.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundurbans er stærsta fenjaviðsbelti við strandlengju í heimi, sem teygir sig 80 km (50 mílur) inn í sveitir Bangladesh og Indlands frá ströndinni. Sundarbans hefur verið sett á heimsminjaskrá UNESCO. Sundarbans-þjóðgarðurinn er það skóglendi sem er á yfirráðasvæði Indlands. Skógarnir eru þó ekki bara fenjaviðs-mýrar, þeir fela í sér nokkra af síðustu stöðum voldugu frumskóganna sem einu sinni náðu yfir alla Gangetic-sléttuna. Sundarbans þekur 3.850 km² svæði, þar af er um þriðjungur þakinn vatni/mýri. Frá árinu 1966 hefur Sundarbans verið dýraverndarsvæði. Talið er þar séu núna 400 Royal Bengal-tígrisdýr og um 30.000 flekkótt dádýr.
mt: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, stretching 80 km (50 miles) inland from the coast of Bangladesh and India. Sundarbans has been listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Sundarbans National Park is the forest area under Indian jurisdiction. The forests are not only mangrove swamps, they also contain some of the last remaining tracts of virgin forest that once covered the entire Gangetic plain. Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km², of which one-third is covered by water/marsh. Since 1966, Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary. There are now estimated to be 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Í heiminum finnast yfir 5.000 mismunandi tungumál, þar af meira en tuttugu sem töluð eru af 50 milljón manns eða meira. Einnig er oft auðveldara að skilja rituð orð en töluð. Það á einkum við um heimilisföng sem er oft erfitt að bera skiljanlega fram. Margar þjóðir eru reiprennandi í ensku og í enn fleiri má búast við takmarkaðri þekkingu, einkum meðal yngra fólks. Ímyndaðu þér fólk frá Manchester, Boston, Jamaíka og Sydney sem situr saman og snæðir kvöldverð á veitingastað í Toronto. Þeir eru að skemmta hver öðrum með sögum frá heimabæ sínum, sagðar með þeirra sérstaka framburði og staðbundnu slangri.
mt: 5,000 different languages are spoken in the world, of which more than twenty are spoken by 50 million people or more. It is often easier to read written words than spoken ones. This is especially true of home languages, which are often difficult to understand. Imagine people from Manchester, Boston, Jamaica and Sydney sitting together and eating dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They are entertaining each other with stories from their home towns, told in their own accents and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Hópbifreiðar fara frá umferðarmiðstöðinni (hinum megin við ána) yfir daginn, þótt flestar, sérstaklega þær sem fara í austur og til Jakar/Bumthang, leggi af stað milli kl. 06:30 og 07:30. Þar sem rúturnar sem ganga milli héraða eru oft fullar, er mælt með því að kaupa miða með nokkurra daga fyrirvara. Litlar japanskar rútur ganga til flestrar hverfa. Þær eru þægilegar og öruggar. Sameiginlegir leigubílar eru fljótleg og þægileg leið til að ferðast til staða í nágrenninu, svo sem Paro (Nu 150) og Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: 4WDs leave from the bus station (opposite the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those going east to Jakar/Bumthang, leave between 6:30 and 7:30. As the buses between districts are often full, it is recommended to buy tickets a few days in advance. Small Japanese buses are generally reliable and safe. Shared taxis are quick and convenient way to get to places nearby, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "Í bland við erfitt aðgengi er farið að nota ""Timbuktu"" sem myndlíkingu fyrir óvenjulega, framandi staði. Í dag er Timbuktu fátækur bær, þó orðspor hans laði enn að ferðamenn og það sé flugvöllur á staðnum. Árið 1990 var staðurinn settur á skrá yfir heimsminjar í hættu vegna ógnarinnar sem steðjaði af eyðimerkursandinum. Þetta var eitt af aðalstoppum á sérstökum undrum Afríku með Henry Louis Gates á PBS. Borgin er í fullkominni andstöðu við aðrar borgir innanlands því hún ber meira arabískt ívaf en afrískt."
mt: "In the midst of difficult access, Timbuktu is used as a metaphor for an unusual, foreign place. Today, Timbuktu is a poor town, though its reputation still attracts tourists and there is an airport on the site. In 1990, the site was listed as a World Heritage Site due to the threat posed by the encroaching desert. This was one of the main stops on the PBS special "African Oddities" with Henry Louis Gates. The city is in stark contrast to other cities within the country as it has more Arab influence than African."
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Ólympíumót fatlaðra fer fram frá 24. ágúst til 5. september 2021. Ákveðnir viðburðir verða haldnir á öðrum stöðum um allt Japan. Þar sem sumarólympíuleikarnir voru haldnir í Tokyo 1964, verður hún eina borgin í Asíu sem hefur haldið leikana tvisvar. Ef þú bókaðir flugferðirnar og gistingar fyrir 2020 áður en tilkynnt var um frestunina lendir þú hugsanlega í erfiðum aðstæðum. Afbókunarreglur eru breytilegar, en frá og með mars munu flestar afbókunarreglur er varða kórónuveiruna ekki ná fram í júlí 2020, þegar Ólympíuleikarnir áttu að hefjast. Búist er við því að flestir miðar á viðburðinn muni kosta á milli 2.500 og 130.000 jen og venjulegir miðar muni kosta um 7.000 jen.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Determined events will be held at other venues across Japan. As the Summer Olympics were held in Tokyo in 1964, it will be the only city in Asia to have hosted the Games twice. If you book flights and accommodations for 2020 before the postponement, you may end up in difficult circumstances. Cancellation policies are variable, but from March most cancellation policies will not apply to the coronavirus, which will not be reached in July 2020, when the Olympics were supposed to start. It is expected that most of the events will cost between 2,500 and 130,000 yen, and the usual events will cost about 7,000 yen.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: "Skýstrokkur er súla af lágþrýstilofti sem snýst í hringi og sýgur inn í sig loftið í kringum sig og þaðan upp á við. Þeir skapa mikinn vindhraða (oft 100-200 mílur/klst) og geta lyft þungum hlutum upp og borið þá með hvirfilbylnum. Þeir byrja sem einskonar trektir sem síga niður úr óveðursskýjum og verða að ""hvirfilbyljum"" þegar þeir snerta jörðina."
mt: "A cumulonimbus cloud is a vertically developed cloud that grows upward from a cumulus cloud and develops a top that spreads out horizontally. They are associated with strong winds and heavy precipitation. They are the most dangerous type of cloud to fly through because of the strong updrafts and downdrafts that they produce. They can produce lightning and hail. They are often associated with thunderstorms."
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Ef gefin er út tilkynning til ferðalanga í landinu sem þú ert að ferðast til kann það að hafa áhrif á sjúkra- eða forfallatrygginguna þína. Einnig væri gott að leita ráða hjá öðrum stjórnvöldun, en ráðgjöf þeirra miðast við þeirra eigin borgara. Sem dæmi gætu aðstæður verið aðrar fyrir bandaríska ríkisborgara í Miðausturlöndum heldur en Evrópubúa og Araba. Álitsgerðir eru eingöngu stuttar samantektir á stjórnmálaástandi í tilteknu landi. Þær skoðanir sem oft er lýst eru  oft yfirborðslegar, altækar og ofureinfaldar miðað við ítarlegri upplýsingar sem eru fáanlegar annars staðar.
mt: If you are traveling to a country that you are insured in, it may affect your health or travel insurance. It would also be good to seek advice from other governments, but their advice is based on their own citizens. For example, conditions may be different for US citizens in the Middle East than for Europeans and Arabs. Opinions are only brief summaries of political situations in a particular country. The views that are often described are superficial, general and unsubstantiated compared to detailed information that is available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Ferðaskrifstofur hafa verið til síðan á 19. öld. Þangað er gott að leita ef ferðast á staði þar sem ferðamaðurinn þekkir ekki náttúru, menningu, tungumálið eða til landa þar sem tekjur eru lágar. Flestar ferðaskrifstofur taka við hefðbundnum bókunum, en tilteknar ferðaskrifstofur sérhæfa sig í sérsniðnum ferðalögum, sérstökum fjárhagsáætlunum eða áfangastöðum. Hugsanlega er betra að nota ferðaskrifstofu sem bókar reglulega svipaðar ferðir og þú hyggst fara í. Skoðaðu hvaða ferðir fulltrúinn er að auglýsa, hvort sem þær eru á vefsíðu eða í búðarglugga.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. They are a good place to look if you are traveling to a place where you do not know the language, culture, or customs. Most travel agencies take standard bookings, but specialized travel agencies specialize in specialized travel, special financial plans, or destinations. It is probably better to use a travel agency that books similar trips and you want to go. Check what trips the agent is advertising, whether they are on the website or in the storefront window.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

It is probably better to use a travel agency that books similar trips and you want to go. Check what trips the agent is advertising, whether they are on the website or in the storefront window.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: "Þú þarft að hafa margt í huga áður þú og þegar þú ferðast eitthvað. Á ferðalögum er best að búast við að hlutirnir séu ekki eins og ""heima"". Siðir, lög, matur, umferð, gististaðir, staðlar, tungumál og svo framvegis mun að einhverju leyti vera ólíkt því sem er á þínum heimaslóðum. Þetta er eitthvað sem þú þarft alltaf að hafa í huga, til að forðast vonbrigði eða kannski jafnvel óbeit á á því hvernig heimamenn gera hlutina."
mt: "You need to have a lot in mind before and when you travel anything. On trips it is best to assume that things are not like "home". Customs, laws, food, traffic, accommodations, standards, language and so on will be different to some extent from what is on your home turf. This is something you always need to have in mind, to avoid disappointment or even a breach of the way home people do the things."
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Ef ferðast er til þróunarlands í fyrsta sinn eða nýrra heimshluta skal ekki vanmeta hversu mikil áhrif menningarmunur getur haft. Margir staðfastir og færir ferðalangar hafa sigrast á nýstárleika á ferðalögum en margar litlar menningarlegar aðlaganir geta fljótt orðið að stórum. Sérstaklega fyrstu dagana ætti maður að leyfa sér að eyða í gæðahótel, mat og þjónustu í vestrænum stíl til að aðlagast betur. Ekki sofa á dýnu eða yfirdýnu á jörðinni á svæðum þar sem þú þekkir ekki dýraríkið á staðnum. Ef þú ætlar að tjalda skaltu taka með þér tjaldbedda eða hengirúm til að forðast snáka, sporðdreka og viðlíka dýr.
mt: If traveling to a developing country for the first time or to a new continent, don't underestimate how much cultural shock can affect you. Many seasoned and experienced travelers have been surprised by the newness of travel in developing countries, but many small cultural differences can quickly become big ones. The first few days, it's best to let yourself get used to the comforts of a Western-style hotel, food and service. Don't sleep on the ground or on top of a bed on areas where you don't know the local animal life. If you plan to camp, bring a tent or hammock to avoid snakes, scorpions and similar animals.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: "Taktu afrit og hafðu skírteinið með þér sem og samskiptaupplýsingar vátryggjanda þíns. Þeir þurfa að sýna netfang vátryggingafélags og alþjóðleg símanúmer til að fá ráð/heimildir og gera kröfur. Geymdu annað afrit í farangrinum þínum og á netinu (sendu þér tölvupóst með viðhengi eða geymdu það í ""skýinu""). Ef ferðast er með fartölvu eða spjaldtölvu skal geyma afrit á minni eða harða diski tölvunnar (sem er hægt að opna án nettengingar). Láttu líka ferðafélaga fá afrit af reglunum/tengiliðaupplýsingum eða deildu þeim með vinum og vandamönnum heima við sem vilja hjálpa til."
mt: "Take a copy and have your emergency contact information with you as well as your emergency contacts' phone numbers. They need to show a net address of a security company and an international phone number to get advice/permission and make requests. Save another copy in your travel documents and on the internet (send yourself an email with the attachment or save it in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, save a copy on the computer's memory or hard drive (which can be opened without internet access). Also let your travel companions get copies of the rules/contacts or share them with friends and home helpers who want to help."
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Ég gegnum tíðina hafa mörg mismunandi snið verið notuð. Venjuleg 35 mm filma (36 x 24 mm negatífa) er langalgengust. Hægt er að fylla nokkuð auðveldlega á filmuna ef hún klárast hjá þér og hún veitir svipaða upplausn og núverandi DSLR. Sumar kvikmyndavélar með miðlungssnið nota 6 x 6 cm snið, nánar tiltekið 56 x 56 mm neikvætt. Þetta gefur næstum fjórfalda upplausn miðað við 35 mm negatífu (3136 mm2 á móti 864).
mt: 35 mm film (36 x 24 mm negatives) is the most common. It can be filled quite easily when it runs out and gives similar resolution to current DSLR. Some mid-range video cameras use 6 x 6 cm format, more specifically 56 x 56 mm square. This gives almost four times the resolution of 35 mm negatives (3136 mm2 vs 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Besta leiðin þegar hafist er handa við ferðaritstörf er að bæta hæfni þína á þekktri vefsíðu með ferðabloggi. Þegar þú hefur náð færni við að sníða og ritstýra á netinu getur þú síðan búið til þína eigin vefsíðu síðar meir.
mt: The best way to start a travel blog is to improve your skills on a familiar website. Once you have mastered the art of writing and editing on the web, you can then create your own website later.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Besta leiðin þegar hafist er handa við ferðaritstörf er að bæta hæfni þína á þekktri vefsíðu með ferðabloggi. Þegar þú hefur náð færni við að sníða og ritstýra á netinu getur þú síðan búið til þína eigin vefsíðu síðar meir.
mt: The best way to start a travel blog is to improve your skills on a familiar website. Once you have mastered the art of writing and editing on the web, you can then create your own website later.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Heima fyrir, sökum þess að maður er stöðugt í návist sýkla, eru góðar líkur á að maður sé þegar orðinn ónæmur fyrir þeim. En í öðrum heimshlutum, þar sem gerlaríkið er manni framandi, eru talsvert meiri líkur á að lenda í vanda. Bakteríur vaxa hraðar og lifa lengur utan líkamans í heitu loftslagi. Þar af leiðandi Delhi Belly plágan, bölvun farósins, hefnd Montezuma og fjölmargir vinir þeirra. Líkt og með öndunarerfiðleika í köldu loftslagi eru þarmavandamál í hlýju loftslagi nokkuð algeng og í flestum tilfellum valda þau töluverðum óþægindum en eru ekki sérlega hættuleg.
mt: At home, because of the constant presence of fecal bacteria, there are good chances of becoming immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the germs are foreign, there are much greater chances of ending up in trouble. Bacteria grow faster and live longer outside the body in hot climates. Hence Delhi Belly, traveler's diarrhea, Montezuma's revenge and many of their friends. Like with respiratory infections in cold climates, gastrointestinal problems in hot climates are quite common and in most cases cause considerable discomfort but are not particularly dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Evrópa er heimsálfa sem er tiltölulega lítil að stærð en með mörg sjálfstæð lönd. Undir venjulegum kringumstæðum þyrfti margoft að fara í gegnum vegabréfsáritanir og vegabréfaeftirlit þegar ferðast er á milli margra landa. Schengen-svæðið virkar eiginlega eins og eitt land að þessu leyti. Ef þú heldur þig á þessu svæði er jafnan hægt að fara yfir landamærin án þess að fara aftur í gegnum vegabréfaeftirlit. Á á svipaðan hátt, með því að hafa Schengen-vegabréfsáritun, þarftu ekki að sækja um vegabréfsáritun fyrir hvert aðildarríki Schengen sérstaklega og þú sparar því tíma, peninga og pappírsvinnu.
mt: Europe is a continent that is relatively small in size but with many sovereign states. Under normal circumstances, one would have to go through border checks and border control when traveling between many countries. The Schengen area works effectively as one country in this regard. If you stay within this area, it is always possible to cross the borders without having to go through border control again. In the same way, with a Schengen border pass, you do not need to apply for a border pass for each Schengen member state separately and you save time, money and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Gröf Tútankamons (KV62). KV62 kann að vera frægasta gröfin í dalnum, þar sem Howard Carter fann því sem næst ósnortna gröf konungsins unga 1922. Í samanburði við flest önnur konungleg grafhýsi er grafhýsi Tútankamons aftur á móti varla þess virði að heimsækja, verandi mun minna og ekki eins skreytt. Allir sem vilja skoða skemmdir sem verða á múmíunni þegar reynt er að fjarlægja hana úr líkkistunni verða vonsviknir, því aðeins sést í höfuðið og herðarnar. Hinn mikli auður grafhýsisins er ekki lengur tiltækur þar og hefur hann verið fluttur á Egypska safnið í Kaíró. Gestir sem hafa takmarkaðan tíma ættu heldur að eyða tíma sínum annars staðar.
mt: The tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 is arguably the most famous tomb in the valley, where Howard Carter found what was almost certainly the intact tomb of the young king in 1922. In comparison with most other royal tombs, the tomb of Tutankhamun is hardly worth visiting, being much smaller and less ornate. All who wish to see the damage done to the mummy when it is attempted to be removed from its coffin will be disappointed, as only the head and hands are visible. The great wealth of the tomb is no longer accessible, having been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time should spend their time elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Margir fara í dagsferð eða helgarferð til Bowen-eyjar, sem býður upp á kajakróður, gönguferðir, verslanir, veitingastaði og fleira. Ósvikna samfélagið er í Howe Sound rétt fyrir utan Vancouver og auðvelt er að nálgast það með vatna-leigubílum sem ganga samkvæmt áætlun frá Granville-eyju í miðbæ Vancouver. Fyrir þá sem hafa gaman af útiveru, er gangan upp að Sea to Sky-landræmunni ómissandi. Whistler (í 1,5 klukkustunda akstursfjarlægð frá Vancouver) er dýr staður og mjög þekktur vegna Vetrarólympíuleikanna 2010. Á veturna er hægt að njóta besta skíðafærisins sem gefst í Norður-Ameríku og á sumrin er hægt að prófa ekta fjallahjólreiðar.
mt: Many people go on day trips or weekend trips to Bowen Island, which offers kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. The small community is in Howe Sound just outside Vancouver and is easily accessible by water taxi from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy the outdoors, the drive up the Sea to Sky Highway is a must. Whistler (a 1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is an expensive and well-known destination due to the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, it is possible to enjoy the best skiing in North America and in the summer, it is possible to try some mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls er bær í vestuhluta Zimbabwe, á móti Livingstone í Zambíu hinum megin landamæranna og nálægt Botswana. Bærinn liggur rétt við fossana en þeir eru aðalaðdráttaraflið. Á þessum vinsæla áfangastað er ýmislegt hægt að gera fyrir ævintýraleitendur og tækifæri eru til að dveljast lengur fyrir þá sem vilja skoða sig um. Á meðan regntímabilið stendur yfir (frá nóvember til mars) er vatnsmagnið mun meira og fossarnir eru mun tilkomumeiri. Það er öruggt að blotna ef farið er yfir brúna eða gengið meðfram handriðinu sem liggja nærri fossunum. Það er samt svo að útsýnið yfir raunverulega fossana er truflað vegna þess að vatnsmagnið er svo mikið!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in the west of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone in Zambia and near Botswana. The town lies next to the falls, but they are the main attraction. There are many things to do for adventure seekers and opportunities to stay longer for those who want to see more. During the rainy season (November to March) the water level is much higher and the falls are much more impressive. It is advisable not to bathe if you cross the bridge or walk along the path near the falls. The view over the real falls is obstructed because the water level is so high!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Victoria Falls er bær í vestuhluta Zimbabwe, á móti Livingstone í Zambíu hinum megin landamæranna og nálægt Botswana. Bærinn liggur rétt við fossana en þeir eru aðalaðdráttaraflið. Á þessum vinsæla áfangastað er ýmislegt hægt að gera fyrir ævintýraleitendur og tækifæri eru til að dveljast lengur fyrir þá sem vilja skoða sig um. Á meðan regntímabilið stendur yfir (frá nóvember til mars) er vatnsmagnið mun meira og fossarnir eru mun tilkomumeiri. Það er öruggt að blotna ef farið er yfir brúna eða gengið meðfram handriðinu sem liggja nærri fossunum. Það er samt svo að útsýnið yfir raunverulega fossana er truflað vegna þess að vatnsmagnið er svo mikið!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in the west of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone in Zambia and near Botswana. The town lies next to the falls, but they are the main attraction. There are many things to do for adventure seekers and opportunities to stay longer for those who want to see more. During the rainy season (November to March) the water level is much higher and the falls are much more impressive. It is advisable not to bathe if you cross the bridge or walk along the path near the falls. The view over the real falls is obstructed because the water level is so high!

src: Reglur um hefðbundna myndatöku eiga líka við um myndbandsupptöku, jafnvel enn meira. Ef bann liggur við myndatöku af einhverju skaltu ekki reyna að taka upp myndskeið af því. Ef dróni er notaður verður að athuga með góðum fyrirvara hvað má kvikmynda og hvaða leyfa eða viðbótarleyfa verður að afla. Að fljúga dróna í grennd við flugvöll eða yfir mannfjölda er nánast alltaf slæm hugmynd þótt það sé ekki ólöglegt þar sem þú býrð.
mt: Rules about taking pictures also apply to video recording, even more so. If a ban exists on taking pictures of something, do not try to record video of it. If a drone is used, be sure to check what can be filmed and what permissions or additional permissions are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it is not illegal, as you are likely to be inconvenienced.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Skráning er viðbótarkrafa í vegabréfsáritunarferlinu. Í sumum löndum verður þú að skrá viðveru þína og það heimilisfang þar sem þú dvelur hjá staðaryfirvöldum. Þetta gæti þýtt að það þurfi að fylla út eyðublað hjá lögreglunni á staðnum eða heimsækja Útlendingastofnun. Í mörgum löndum þar sem slík lög eru í gildi sjá hótelin á staðnum sjá um skráninguna (gætið þess að spyrja um slíkt). Í öðrum tilvikum þurfa eingöngu aðilar sem dvelja í gistiaðstöðu sem ekki er fyrir ferðamenn að skrá sig. Lögin eru hins vegar mjög óljós hvað þetta varðar og því verður að leita upplýsinga áður en haldið er af stað.
mt: This is an additional requirement in the visa application form. In some countries, you must record your presence and the address where you are staying with local authorities. This could mean filling out a form with the police at the location or visiting the Immigration Office. In many countries where such laws are in effect, the hotels at the location see to the registration (you may ask about this). In other cases, only those staying in a guesthouse not intended for tourists must register. The laws are however very unclear as to what this entails and therefore it is necessary to seek information before setting out.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Sjálfboðastarf á ferðalögum er mjög góð leið til að láta gott af sér leiða, en það snýst um fleira en að gefa. Að búa og bjóða sig fram til sjálfboðastarfs í erlendu landi er frábær leið til að kynnast annarri menningu, kynnast nýju fólki, læra um sjálfan sig, fá tilfinningu fyrir nýju sjónarhorni og jafnvel öðlast nýja færni. Önnur góð leið til að spara peninga er að skipuleggja lengri dvöl, því oft fylgir matur og gisting með sjálfboðaliðastörfum og í vissum tilvikum eru greidd laun.
mt: Self-employment is a great way to let good things happen, but it's about more than just giving. To offer and present oneself as self-employed in a foreign country is a great way to get to know another culture, get to know new people, learn about oneself, feel for new perspectives and even gain new skills. Another good way to save money is to plan a longer stay, as food and lodging often come with self-employment and in some cases wages are paid.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "Ferð til Walt Disney World er frábær pílagrímsferð fyrir margar fjölskyldur í Bandaríkjunum. ""Dæmigerð"" heimsókn felst í því að fljúga til alþjóðaflugvallarins í Orlando, fara með rútu á Disney-hótel, eyða um viku án þess að fara úr Disney-garðinum og snúa aftur heim. Óendanleg tilbrigði eru möguleg en þetta er það sem flestir meina þegar talað er um að „fara í Disney World"". Margir miðar sem seldir eru á netinu í gegnum uppboðsvefsíður á borð við eBay eða Craigslist, eru miðar sem gilda í nokkra daga í mismunandi garða og hafa verið notaðir að hluta til. Þó þetta sé mjög algengt bannar Disney það. Óheimilt er að framselja miðana."
mt: "A trip to Walt Disney World is a great pilgrimage for many families in the United States. ""Perfect"" vacation consists of flying to the international airport in Orlando, taking a bus to a Disney hotel, spending a week without leaving the Disney parks and returning home. Endless possibilities are possible but this is what most people mean when they say ""going to Disney World"". Many items sold on the Internet through auction sites such as eBay or Craigslist are items that are valid for a few days in different parks and have been used in part. Although this is very common, Disney prohibits it. It is illegal to sell the items."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."
