src: Allir þeir sem hafa hug á að heimsækja land sem er flokkað sem átakasvæði verða að gangast undir sérstaka fagþjálfun. Leit á netinu að „Hostile environment course“ gefur líklega upp heimilisfang hjá fyrirtæki í nágrenninu. Yfirleitt er farið yfir alla efnisflokkana sem hér er lýst í námskeiðinu og yfirleitt með starfsþjálfun. Námskeiðið stendur yfirleitt yfir í 2-5 daga og felur í sér hlutverkaleiki, mikla þjálfun í skyndihjálp og í sumum tilvikum vopnaþjálfun. Mikið er um bækur og tímarit sem fjalla um líf í óbyggðum, en útgáfurit sem fjalla um stríðshrjáð svæði eru ekki svo mörg.
mt: All those who intend to visit a country classified as a hostile environment must undergo specific training. A search on the internet for "Hostile environment course" will likely give the address of a company in the area. The course usually covers all the chemical classes listed here and usually with on-the-job training. The course usually lasts 2-5 days and includes roles, extensive training in first aid and in some cases weapons training. There are many books and journals that discuss life in the wilderness, but there are not so many publications that discuss war-torn areas.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Margar leiðir eru færar til að hreinsa vatn. Sumar gagnast betur gegn ákveðnum ógnum. Á sumum stöðum er nóg að sjóða vatn í eina mínútu en á öðrum stöðum verður að sjóða vatnið lengur. Síur eru misgóðar og ef þú ert með áhyggjur ættirðu að huga að því að kaupa vatnið þitt í innsigluðum flöskum frá áreiðanlegu fyrirtæki.
mt: There are many ways to purify water. Some methods are better against certain contaminants. At some locations, it takes only one minute to purify water, while at other locations, it takes longer. Filters are not always good and if you are concerned, you should buy your water in sealed bottles from a reputable company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Útsog er frásogið frá öldum sem brotna á ströndinni, oft á rifi eða álíka. Vegna staðhátta landgrunnsins safnast bakrennslið í nokkrum dýpri hlutum og hraður straumur á djúpsjávarvatni getur myndast þar. Flest dauðsföll verða vegna þreytu við að reyna að synda á móto straumnum, en það kann að vera ekki mögulegt. Um leið og maður kemst úr straumnum er ekkert mál að synda til baka. Reyndu að vera í skjóli eða, allt eftir hæfileikum og hvort sést hefur til þín, bíða eftir björgun.
mt: The description is from centuries of shipwrecks on the coast, often on reefs or similar. Due to the land's geography, backwash can collect in some deeper parts and a fast current can form there. Most deaths are from exhaustion trying to swim against the current, but it may not be possible. As soon as you get out of the current, there is no need to swim back. Try to stay in the shelter or, depending on your abilities and whether you can see, wait for rescue.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Skipgengar vatnaleiðir eru áhugaverður kostur fyrir sumarleyfi. Til dæmis til að skoða kastala í Loire-dalnum, heimsækja Rínardalinn eða fara í skemmtisiglingu til áhugaverðra borga við Dóná eða bátasiglingu niður Erie-skurðinn. Þeir afmarka einnig vinsælar hjóla- og gönguleiðir.
mt: Waterways are a popular option for summer permits. For example, to see castles along the Loire river, visit the Rhine valley or take a pleasure cruise to interesting cities along the Danube or Erie Canal. They also mark popular hiking and biking trails.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Í norðri liggja landamæri héraðsins að Sahel og í suðri og vestri að Atlantshafinu. Konur: Ráðlagt er að konur sem ferðast segist vera giftar, án tillits til raunverulegrar hjúskaparstöðu. Einnig er gagnlegt að bera hring (bara ekki hring sem lítur út fyrir að vera of dýr). Konur ættu að gera sér grein fyrir að ólík menning getur birst í því sem þær teldu áreitni og ekki er óalgengt að vera eltur, gripið í handlegginn o.s.frv. Vertu ákveðin þegar þú hafnar mönnum og óhrædd að standa fast á þínu (menningarlegur munur eða ekki réttlætir þetta ekki!).
mt: In the north, the region borders Sahel and in the south and west, the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that women who travel are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is also advisable to wear a ring (not a ring that looks too expensive). Women should be aware that different cultures may be present in what they consider to be polite and not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the wrist, etc. Be firm when you refuse men and do not hesitate to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, this does not justify it!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Í norðri liggja landamæri héraðsins að Sahel og í suðri og vestri að Atlantshafinu. Konur: Ráðlagt er að konur sem ferðast segist vera giftar, án tillits til raunverulegrar hjúskaparstöðu. Einnig er gagnlegt að bera hring (bara ekki hring sem lítur út fyrir að vera of dýr). Konur ættu að gera sér grein fyrir að ólík menning getur birst í því sem þær teldu áreitni og ekki er óalgengt að vera eltur, gripið í handlegginn o.s.frv. Vertu ákveðin þegar þú hafnar mönnum og óhrædd að standa fast á þínu (menningarlegur munur eða ekki réttlætir þetta ekki!).
mt: In the north, the region borders Sahel and in the south and west, the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that women who travel are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is also advisable to wear a ring (not a ring that looks too expensive). Women should be aware that different cultures may be present in what they consider to be polite and not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the wrist, etc. Be firm when you refuse men and do not hesitate to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, this does not justify it!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Villt náttúra er eitt erfiðasta viðfangsefni ljósmyndara og krefst blöndu heppni, þolinmæði, reynslu og góðs búnaðar. Oft er ljósmyndun af villtri náttúru tekið sem sjálfsögðum hlut, en eins og ljósmyndun almennt jafngildir ein mynd þúsund orðum. Þegar teknar eru myndir af villtri náttúru þarf oft að nota langa aðdráttarlinsu, þó nota þurfi aðrar linsur fyrir hóp fugla eða örlítil dýr. Örðugt getur reynst að finna mörg framandi dýr og í sumum almenningsgörðum eru fyrir hendi reglur varðandi myndatöku í atvinnuskyni. Villt dýr kunna að vera ýmist feimin eða árásargjörn. Unhverfið kann að vera kalt, heitt eða fjandsamlegt með öðrum hætti.
mt: Wild nature is one of the most difficult subjects for photographers and requires a blend of luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Often, taking pictures of wild nature is taken as a given, but as with photography in general, a thousand words can be conveyed in one image. When taking pictures of wild nature, a long telephoto lens is often needed, though other lenses can be used for groups of birds or small animals. It can be difficult to find many wild animals and in some public areas there are rules regarding photography for commercial purposes. Wild animals can be either friendly or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot or unfriendly in other ways.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Líklegt er að allir sem keyra í mikilli hæð yfir sjávarmáli eða yfir fjallaskörð lendi í miklum snjó, krapa og kulda á leið sinni. Á ísi og snævi þöktum vegum er núningur lítill og þú getur ekki keyrt eins og þú værir á beru malbiki. Í hríðarbyl getur snjóað það mikið að maður festist á örskotsstundu. Skyggni kann einnig að takmarkast af snjókomu eða skafrenningi eða ísingu á bílrúðum. Ísilagðar og snævi þaktar aðstæður eru aftur á móti venjubundnar í mörgum löndum og umferðin gengur að mestu ótrufluð fyrir sig allt árið um kring.
mt: It is likely that all who drive in high altitudes over sea level or over mountain passes will encounter heavy snow, slush and cold on their way. On icy and snowy roads, traction is minimal and you cannot drive as if you were on a paved road. In a blizzard, it can snow so much that you can get stuck in a matter of minutes. Visibility can also be limited by snowfall or slush or icing on your car's tires. Icy and snowy conditions are, on the other hand, common in many countries and traffic goes on largely unimpeded throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Þegar unnið er í útlöndum verður að skila skattskýrslu í því landi, nema ef viðkomandi er diplómati. Tekjuskatti er skipt niður á mismunandi hátt eftir löndum og skatthlutfall og skattþrep eru mjög ólík á milli landa. Í sumum alríkislöndum, eins og Bandaríkjunum og Kanada, er tekjuskattur innheimtur bæði af alríkinu og hverju ríki fyrir sig, þannig að skatthlutfallið og skattþrepin eru breytileg eftir landsvæðum.
mt: When working abroad, you must file a tax return in that country, unless you are a diplomat. Income tax is divided differently in different countries and tax rates and brackets are very different between countries. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is collected both by the federal government and each state, so that tax rates and brackets vary by region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Heimssýning (oft kölluð Alþjóðleg vörusýning) er stór alþjóðleg lista- og vísindahátíð. Þátttökulönd kynna listrænar og fræðandi sýningar í þjóðskálum til að sýna heimstengd atriði eða menningar- og sögutengda þætti lands síns. Garðyrkjusýningar á alþjóðavísu eru sérhæfðir atburðir þar sem sýndar eru blómaútstillingar, grasagarðar og aðrir hlutir sem tengjast plönturíkinu. Fræðilega séð getur slíkt átt sér stað árlega (svo lengi sem slíkt á sér stað í sitt hvoru landinu), en í reynd er slíkt ekki gert. Þessir atburðir vara venjulega á bilinu þrjá til sex mánuði og eru haldnir á stöðum sem eru ekki minni en 50 hektarar.
mt: A World Expo (also known as a World's Fair) is a large international exhibition designed as an experiential contrast to the city that hosts it, usually displaying recent discoveries, changes, and inventions, as well as hopes for the future. The event may evolve into a permanent public exhibition, such as the Great Exhibition of 1851, the Exposition Universelle of 1889, or the Exposition Internationale des Arts et Techniques de 1937. The term "World Expo" is also used to refer to the World's Fair held in Chicago in 1933 and 1934. The term "World Expo" is also used to refer to the World's Fair held in Chicago in 1933 and 1934.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Þó mörg dýranna í garðinu séu vön því að sjá menn, eru villt dýr engu að síður villt og það má ekki gefa þeim að éta eða trufla þau. Samkvæmt yfirmönnum þjóðgarðsins ber að halda a.m.k. 100 metra fjarlægð frá bjarndýrum og úlfum og 25 metra fjarlægð frá öllum öðrum villtum dýrum. Sama hversu friðsæl þau líta út þá geta vísundar, elgir og birnir og næstum öll stór dýr ráðist á fólk. Árlega slasast tugir gesta vegna þess að þeir halda ekki viðeigandi fjarlægð. Þessi dýr eru stór, villt og geta reynst hættuleg, því skal gefa þeim nægt rými. Þar að auki verður þú að hafa í huga að lykt laðar að bjarndýr og annað dýralíf og því skaltu forðast að hafa með þér eða elda matvæli með sterkri lykt og ganga úr skugga um að halda tjaldbúðunum hreinum.
mt: While many of the animals in the park are tame because of seeing people, the wild animals are still wild and it is not allowed to feed them or disturb them. According to park officials, you should keep at least 100 meters from bears and wolves and 25 meters from all other wild animals. The same as how peaceful they look, they can attack people. Every year, dozens of visitors are injured because they do not keep the proper distance. These animals are large, wild and can be dangerous, so give them enough space. In addition, you should be aware of the smell that attracts bears and other wildlife and therefore avoid having food or cooking food with a strong smell and be careful to keep the tents clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
